String.Source: Hey, I feel much better! Do that again!
String.Dest: 嘿，我感觉好多了！再来一次！

String.Source: Thank you.
String.Dest: 谢谢。

String.Source: Oh no! Where did I go? My worst fears, realized!
String.Dest: Oh no! Where did I go? My worst fears, realized!

String.Source: I feel empowered! Like I don't even need makeup!
String.Dest: 我倍受鼓舞！就像我甚至不需要化妆一样！

String.Source: Suddenly, I don't want to shout anymore.
String.Dest: 突然我就不再想大喊大叫了。

String.Source: That tickles!
String.Dest: 那很痒！

String.Source: Boulder trap, straight ahead!
String.Dest: Boulder trap, straight ahead!

String.Source: This mine has a lot of iron. I don't see why these bandits need to kill mammoths too. That's just being greedy.
String.Dest: 这个洞有那么多的铁矿。真搞不懂这些强盗干嘛还杀猛犸象赚钱。太贪心了吧。

String.Source: If Golldir's family is anything like mine, there's probably dozens, no, hundreds of Draugr in there. I hope you're ready.
String.Dest: 如果Golldir的家族和我的族群一样的话，的家族和我的族群一样的话恐怕有几十个，不对是几百个尸鬼在里面。希望你准备好了。

String.Source: Look, a hole in the wall. Wait, why is there a stone wall in a cave? Well, at least somebody smashed it.
String.Dest: Look, a hole in the wall. Wait, why is there a stone wall in a cave? Well, at least somebody smashed it.

String.Source: Christer and wife, together again! Well, not yet, but soon. We just have to convince these kidnappers to stop being themselves.
String.Dest: Christer和他老婆又在一起了！呃，现在还没，但很快就会了。我们只要说服那些绑架者改邪归正就行。

String.Source: Crawlies! There must be a lot if they made this web! Bite into your grass pods, adventurers! There's no poison we can't resist!
String.Dest: 小爬虫！这肯定要有很多这玩意才能织成这样的网！【含着你们的草药】冒险者们！没有什么我们扛不住的毒！

String.Source: It looks like we can sneak in between the bone chimes. Luckily we adventurers are in good shape! My aunt Natilda could never fit through that.
String.Dest: 看起来我们可以从骨钟的中间潜进去。非常幸运，我们这些冒险者的体型刚好能做到。我那个Natilda阿姨太肥，估计永远也过不去。

String.Source: Something scary's behind those fences. But so is a jump off Bard's Leap, and there's nowhere else to run.
String.Dest: 那些栅栏后面有些很可怕的东西。但这样一来就得跳下诗人之跃，而且这也没有别的路可以逃跑。

String.Source: That's a lot of moss. I thought it only grows on the north side of things.
String.Dest: 这儿的苔藓真多啊。我还以为它是只生长在南方的东西呢。

String.Source: Stop, stop, stop! I think I see danger! No, wait, never mind. Go on ahead.
String.Dest: 停下停下停下！我好像看见危险了！不，等一下，没事。继续前进。

String.Source: Darkness up ahead. Let's show them the whites of our teeth! Let's smile our way to victory!
String.Dest: 黑暗横在前方。让我们亮出雪白的牙齿！微笑着走上胜利之路！

String.Source: Spiders. They're a part of nature too, but not the good kind. Especially if they use magic. That's just wrong.
String.Dest: 蜘蛛。他们是自然中的一部分，但不是好的那种。特别是如果他们使用魔法。这不对的。

String.Source: Danger ahead! Lots of slippery ice! Also, vampires!
String.Dest: 前面很危险！很容易滑倒！而且还有吸血鬼！

String.Source: Danger ahead. Dibella give us glory.
String.Dest: 前面危险。愿迪贝拉之圣光护佑我们。

String.Source: I sense trouble. Let us draw our weapons and smite the unbelievers!
String.Dest: 我感觉有麻烦了。让我们拔出武器，干掉那些缺乏信仰的人！

String.Source: Danger lies ahead, but fear not. The Gods protect us.
String.Dest: 前方有危险，但别怕。众神会保佑我们的。

String.Source: Oh, I've been here before! There were creepy crawlies everywhere. Normally I like looking at spider webs, but not when there's people in them.
String.Dest: 哦，我以前来过这里！这里到处都是爬虫类。一般来说我挺喜欢看蜘蛛网的，不过不是有人粘在里面那种。

String.Source: Wow, will you look at that! Even in the glacial north, nature finds a way to thrive! We should climb up to the top and take turns shouting!
String.Dest: 喔，你看那里！就算在冰封的北方，自然都能找到办法茁壮生长！我们应该爬到那顶上然后好好吼上几声！

String.Source: That's a lot of scaffolding. It's really impressive. And really brown.
String.Dest: 那是一堆绞刑架。挺让人印象深刻的。但也真够压抑的。

String.Source: Will you look at that! A great view of the sky and all of Whiterun. Try not to run out of air, because this view's breathtaking!
String.Dest: 看看那个！无垠的天空和整个雪漫城。小心别喘不过气儿，因为这景色就是让人激动到透不过气儿啊！

String.Source: What beauty! What a sight! Another gift from the Gods!
String.Dest: 何等的美丽！何等的胜景！真是鬼斧神工！

String.Source: What a spectacular view! There's trees, and animals, and...is that someone swimming naked in the river? I think I'll just enjoy the sky.
String.Dest: 这风景真是惊艳啊！那些树，动物，还有……是有人在河里裸泳吗？我还是欣赏天空好啦。

String.Source: By Dibella, are you seeing this? Am I seeing this? I'd hate for this to be another dream.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉在上，你看见了这个了吗？我看见这个了吗？难道我又在做梦吗。

String.Source: Such magnificence! Grab your quills! Write your steward! Truly Dibella has blessed this place for all the world to see!
String.Dest: 这是何等的荣耀！拿起你的笔！写下你侍奉她的经历！让全世界都看到这片土地确实受到了迪贝拉的祝福！

String.Source: This place is wonderful. I dare not blink!
String.Dest: 这地方真赞。我都不敢眨眼了！

String.Source: Wow, a Dwarven...something or other. I was going to say a fort, but why would you build a fort behind a building? In any case it's really noisy.
String.Dest: Wow, a Dwarven...something or other. I was going to say a fort, but why would you build a fort behind a building? In any case it's really noisy.

String.Source: A cave! I love caves!
String.Dest: 一个山洞！我爱洞穴！

String.Source: There's a cave here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 这有个洞穴，咱们进去看看？

String.Source: A cave. What will we find, trouble or treasure? Hopefully nature.
String.Dest: 有个山洞。在里面能发现什么？是包袱还是宝贝？希望不会太糟糕。

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of beauty inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看啊。一个洞穴。我希望里面有很多美景。

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这儿有个洞穴。野兽，强盗，说不定都有。

String.Source: A cave! Onward into the great unknown!
String.Dest: 一个山洞！大步向前方的未知迈进吧！

String.Source: A Nord ruin! Put on your adventure helms, it's time to go exploring!
String.Dest: 一个诺德遗迹！带上你的冒险专用头盔吧，是时候去探索了！

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。可能有上千年的历史了。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins are big and dangerous. And there's not much nature. But if we search high and low, far and wide, Dibella will reward us.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹都是宏伟而危险的。也没什么自然的成分。但只要我们上下求索，放眼搜寻，迪贝拉 会给我们奖赏的。

String.Source: A Dwarven city. They're dusty.
String.Dest: 一个矮人城市。到处是灰啊。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I'd rather not find out.
String.Dest: 传说矮人废墟闹鬼。我情愿没找到这里。

String.Source: A Dwarven ruin. I've never seen a Dwarf. Do you think we'll find one?
String.Dest: 一个矮人遗迹。我从来没见过一个矮人呢。你感觉我们能找到一个吗？

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Of course! Get out the fine dinnerware! Ready your tongue! Prepare to dine on the best meal you've ever tasted!
String.Dest: 当然！拿出精美的餐具！准备胃口大开吧！这保准是你吃过的最好的一餐！

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Here you go! This is fresh. When our stomachs get grumpy, nature spares no expense!
String.Dest: 拿着！这是新鲜的。当我们的胃口越来越刁，自然不惜工本！

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sorry love, but Dibella and I think you've been eating too much. I'll have another one tomorrow.
String.Dest: 抱歉我的爱， 但是迪贝拉与我都认为你今天吃的已经够多了。我会明天再给你做一个的。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Is that a new steading? By Dibella, that's a great idea! We'll practically be living outside!
String.Dest: 那是一座新农庄吗？ 迪贝拉在上，那真是个好主意！我们将在外面生活了！

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Is that a new steading? By Dibella, that's a great idea! We'll practically be living outside!
String.Dest: 那是一座新农庄吗？ 迪贝拉在上，那真是个好主意！我们将在外面生活了！

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Is that a new steading? By Dibella, that's a great idea! We'll practically be living outside!
String.Dest: 那是一座新农庄吗？ 迪贝拉在上，那真是个好主意！我们将在外面生活了！

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Solitude is perfect! It's only a stone's throw away from the college. Not that we'll be throwing stones at any bards, no matter how bad they play.
String.Dest: 独孤城太完美了！人们仅仅是把石头砸向吟游诗人学院，而不会向任何一个吟游诗人扔石头，不管他们演奏的多烂。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Windhelm. That place is depressing. Which is why it's perfect for us! We'll turn every frown upside down and make it the happiest place in Skyrim!
String.Dest: 风舵城。那是个令人忧伤的地方，但也正是因为如此，那个地方对于我们来说真是完美极了！让我们把那里的压抑情绪一扫而光将它变成天际省的乐土吧！

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Markarth! My childhood home! We can take walks by the waterfall or down by the river. And if the miners get grumpy, we'll shout them down!
String.Dest: 马卡斯城！我儿时的家！我们可以在瀑布旁散步或者坐在河旁。如果矿工们生气了，我们就把他们吼趴下！

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: That sounds wonderful! We can go fishing by the lake, or set up camp in the forest and cheer on the leaves as they fall around us!
String.Dest: 这听起来太棒了!我们可以在湖边钓鱼,或在森林里安营扎寨,当叶子飘落到我们身旁时还可以尽情欢呼!

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Whiterun is great! You can get a good view of the stars at night. Although I wish they'd tear down Dragonsreach. That just gets in the way.
String.Dest: 白漫城真是好极了！在晚上你能好好看看那美丽的星空。不过我希望他们能把龙临厅给拆了。那东西太挡视野。

String.Source: Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: Living with me? You mean, outside with nature? Great idea, my love, I can't think of a better place to live!
String.Dest: 跟我一起生活？你是说，回归自然？好主意，亲爱的，我想不出一个更好的地方了！

String.Source: Living with me? You mean, outside with nature? Great idea, my love, I can't think of a better place to live!
String.Dest: 和我住在一起？你是说，住在野外吗？好主意，亲爱的，我想不出一个更好的住所了！

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: We're married! It's time to shout our love from the rooftops! But first we need a roof to shout it from. What I'm saying is, where should we live?
String.Dest: 我们结婚了！我们该到屋顶上去大声宣誓我的爱了！但首先我们需要一个屋顶喊。我想说的是，我们应该去哪住？

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Alright! Put on your moving gloves! Apply the elbow grease! Our new home awaits!
String.Dest: 好了，穿上你的运动手套！涂点油！我们的新家正等着呢！

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Alright! Put on your moving gloves! Apply the elbow grease! Our new home awaits!
String.Dest: 好了，穿上你的运动手套！涂点油！我们的新家正等着呢！

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Alright! Put on your moving gloves! Apply the elbow grease! Our new home awaits!
String.Dest: 好了，穿上你的运动手套！涂点油！我们的新家正等着呢！

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: Yes! You took the words right out of my mouth! Adventurers can't stay in one place! Put on your moving gloves and point the way!
String.Dest: Yes! You took the words right out of my mouth! Adventurers can't stay in one place! Put on your moving gloves and point the way!

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Solitude is perfect! It's only a stone's throw away from the college. Not that we'll be throwing stones at any bards, no matter how bad they play.
String.Dest: 独孤城太完美了！人们仅仅是把石头砸向吟游诗人学院，而不会向任何一个吟游诗人扔石头，不管他们演奏的多烂。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Windhelm. That place is depressing. Which is why it's perfect for us! We'll turn every frown upside down and make it the happiest place in Skyrim!
String.Dest: 风舵城。那是个令人忧伤的地方，但也正是因为如此，那个地方对于我们来说真是完美极了！让我们把那里的压抑情绪一扫而光将它变成天际省的乐土吧！

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Markarth! My childhood home! We can take walks by the waterfall or down by the river. And if the miners get grumpy, we'll shout them down!
String.Dest: 马卡斯城！我儿时的家！我们可以在瀑布旁散步或者坐在河旁。如果矿工们生气了，我们就把他们吼趴下！

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: That sounds wonderful! We can go fishing by the lake, or set up camp in the forest and cheer on the leaves as they fall around us!
String.Dest: 这听起来太棒了!我们可以在湖边钓鱼,或在森林里安营扎寨,当叶子飘落到我们身旁时还可以尽情欢呼!

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Whiterun is great! You can get a good view of the stars at night. Although I wish they'd tear down Dragonsreach. That just gets in the way.
String.Dest: 白漫城真是好极了！在晚上你能好好看看那美丽的星空。不过我希望他们能把龙临厅给拆了。那东西太挡视野。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Living with me? You mean, outside with nature? Great idea, my love, I can't think of a better place to live!
String.Dest: 跟我一起生活？你是说，回归自然？好主意，亲爱的，我想不出一个更好的地方了！

String.Source: Living with me? You mean, outside with nature? Great idea, my love, I can't think of a better place to live!
String.Dest: 和我住在一起？你是说，住在野外吗？好主意，亲爱的，我想不出一个更好的住所了！

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Yes! Lots of gold! More than we could possibly ever need! But don't worry, I gave most of it away! This is the rest of it.
String.Dest: 是的！一大堆金子！我们比任何时候都更需要它！但是别担心，我几乎全都拿走了！这剩下的金子。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Farewell, my love.
String.Dest: 再见了，亲爱的。

String.Source: Farewell, my dear.
String.Dest: 再见了，亲爱的。

String.Source: So this is home! I guess I should do something to keep myself busy. Maybe start a store that only sells beautiful things!
String.Dest: 这就是我们家了！我想我得做些什么让我自己忙碌些。 或许可以开一间卖漂亮小东西的店。

String.Source: Welcome home love!
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，亲爱的。

String.Source: Back from another adventure? Next time be sure to take your wife!
String.Dest: 冒险回来了？下次你应该带者你的老婆去！

String.Source: Forget it. I was just testing the waters.
String.Dest: 忘了吧，我只是在测试你。.

String.Source: Oh...but the waters are warm! Don't be afraid to dive in!
String.Dest: 哦……但这水是温的！大胆的跳下来吧！

String.Source: Would you be interested in getting married?
String.Dest: 你有兴趣结婚吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Marriage? To me? But I'm so young! What do I do? What do I say?
String.Dest: 结婚？跟我？可我才这么小呢！我能干嘛？我要说什么？

String.Source: If you got married, would it be at the Temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: 如果你要举行婚礼，会在迪贝拉神殿吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: It would, if the temple actually stood for Dibella's teachings. Or if they actually stood at all.
String.Dest: 会的，倘若神殿实际上就是代表着迪贝拉的教义。或者他们事实上完全代表着。

String.Source: If you got married, would it be at the Temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: 如果你要举行婚礼，会在迪贝拉神殿吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I've heard those priestesses spend most of their time on their backs. I don't even know what that means, but it sounds suspicious.
String.Dest: 我听说那些女祭司花费大量的时间在她们的后背上，我甚至不知道那是什么意思，但是听起来很可疑。

String.Source: You can start by saying yes.
String.Dest: 你可以从说“是”开始。

String.Source: Yes, I can. I mean, Yes, I'll marry you! Yes to everything! Gather the priests! Send the invitations!
String.Dest: 是的，我愿意。我指的是..对，我会嫁给你！一切都太棒了！去找祭司！发邀请函吧！

String.Source: You can start by saying yes.
String.Dest: 你可以从说“是”开始。

String.Source: On second thought, don't send the invitations! Why? Because I don't know if my family will approve! But marry we shall!
String.Dest: 考虑一下，或许我们可以不发邀请函！为什么呢？因为我不确定我的家人会答应我结婚。但我们还是要结。

String.Source: Is that an Amulet of Dibella you're wearing? Oh no, it's the other kind. Wait, are you looking for marriage?
String.Dest: 你戴的是狄贝拉的护符吗？喔不，那是另一种。等等，你是在找另一半吗？

String.Source: Have you spoken to the priest? Make sure he hears you. Don't be afraid to shout.
String.Dest: 你已经跟祭司讲了吗？确定他会照你说的，不怕大喊。

String.Source: Hands up! Hands forward! Right into their nose!
String.Dest: 手举起来！朝前挥拳！往他们鼻子上揍！

String.Source: Punch! Don't get punched! Keep doing that and you'll win!
String.Dest: 往死里打！躲开对方的攻击！做到这点你就赢了！

String.Source: One septim on my Companion! The rest to the donation bowl!
String.Dest: 一个金币交到我同伴的手中！剩下的放到捐赠碗里！

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 打啊！打！

String.Source: Why? The mages will just destroy it again.
String.Dest: Why? The mages will just destroy it again.

String.Source: It is kind of strange they didn't put their barrier over the town. But I don't get how magic works.
String.Dest: It is kind of strange they didn't put their barrier over the town. But I don't get how magic works.

String.Source: Why? The mages will just destroy it again.
String.Dest: Why? The mages will just destroy it again.

String.Source: Maybe it's like building a roof, and you only have so much straw.
String.Dest: Maybe it's like building a roof, and you only have so much straw.

String.Source: I agree. The Nords here need to reconstruct Winterhold.
String.Dest: I agree. The Nords here need to reconstruct Winterhold.

String.Source: True, although they might want to do it further inland. Maybe near fresh water, and more plants.
String.Dest: True, although they might want to do it further inland. Maybe near fresh water, and more plants.

String.Source: I agree. The Nords here need to reconstruct Winterhold.
String.Dest: I agree. The Nords here need to reconstruct Winterhold.

String.Source: Really, sometimes I think Kynareth ruined this town on purpose.
String.Dest: Really, sometimes I think Kynareth ruined this town on purpose.

String.Source: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.
String.Dest: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.

String.Source: Well, storms are spun by Kynareth, and she's no Dibella, that much I can tell you.
String.Dest: Well, storms are spun by Kynareth, and she's no Dibella, that much I can tell you.

String.Source: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.
String.Dest: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.

String.Source: Although I don't think Dibella would approve of living here either. There's just not enough color.
String.Dest: Although I don't think Dibella would approve of living here either. There's just not enough color.

String.Source: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.
String.Dest: Even if you rebuild, you never know when nature will strike again.

String.Source: Really, sometimes I think Kynareth ruined this town on purpose.
String.Dest: Really, sometimes I think Kynareth ruined this town on purpose.

String.Source: Some might argue there's no point rebuilding if no one wants to live here.
String.Dest: Some might argue there's no point rebuilding if no one wants to live here.

String.Source: That's not true. I'm sure some of the Dark Elves in Windhelm wouldn't mind moving here.
String.Dest: That's not true. I'm sure some of the Dark Elves in Windhelm wouldn't mind moving here.

String.Source: Some might argue there's no point rebuilding if no one wants to live here.
String.Dest: Some might argue there's no point rebuilding if no one wants to live here.

String.Source: This town could use a little more color. Even if it's mostly gray.
String.Dest: This town could use a little more color. Even if it's mostly gray.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?
String.Dest: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?

String.Source: Well, I've heard it was a storm, although some people say it was mages. Supposedly that's why the College was untouched.
String.Dest: Well, I've heard it was a storm, although some people say it was mages. Supposedly that's why the College was untouched.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?
String.Dest: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?

String.Source: Either way, as my uncle Haas says, you can grab a tissue or grab a hammer!
String.Dest: Either way, as my uncle Haas says, you can grab a tissue or grab a hammer!

String.Source: Do you think this town will ever thrive again?
String.Dest: Do you think this town will ever thrive again?

String.Source: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?
String.Dest: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?

String.Source: Sure. You know how Nords are. If we aren't fighting, we're drinking! If we aren't drinking, we're building!
String.Dest: Sure. You know how Nords are. If we aren't fighting, we're drinking! If we aren't drinking, we're building!

String.Source: Do you think this town will ever thrive again?
String.Dest: Do you think this town will ever thrive again?

String.Source: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?
String.Dest: What are your thoughts on what happened to Winterhold?

String.Source: So we just need to end the wars and hide the mead. Then this city will be as right as Rain's Hand!
String.Dest: So we just need to end the wars and hide the mead. Then this city will be as right as Rain's Hand!

String.Source: It doesn't even out. Not even close. Lycanthropy is a disease to be cured.
String.Dest: 这不正常，一点也不。狼化病是种必须治疗的疾病。

String.Source: Then let's cure them! Every last member of the Circle will be purified by our light! And if we can't cure them, we'll shave them!
String.Dest: 那么让我们治愈他们吧！每一个圆环的成员都将被我们的光所净化！如果不能治好他们，那我们就剃光他们的毛儿！

String.Source: It doesn't even out. Not even close. Lycanthropy is a disease to be cured.
String.Dest: 这不正常，一点也不。狼化病是种必须治疗的疾病。

String.Source: Yes! Grab the scissors! No, the shears! Let no hair stand in the way of beauty!
String.Dest: 是！操起剪刀！不，剪刀们【剪刀手们？此处待修改。】！让通往美的道路上寸草不生！

String.Source: They're also filthy beasts. I guess that's why I like them and you don't.
String.Dest: 他们也是肮脏的野兽。也许那就是为什么我喜欢他们而你不。

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the smell. But mother says if you can't say anything nice, then hold your nose and smile.
String.Dest: 是…我闻到了。可妈妈说如果你想不出什么漂亮话说，那就捏住鼻子笑笑。

String.Source: The Companions do more than good work. They're heroes.
String.Dest: 战友团的功劳可不止是很大而已。他们都是英雄的存在。.

String.Source: I don't know...are heroes supposed to be mean and scary? Are they supposed to have so much...hair? It doesn't seem right to me.
String.Dest: 我不知道……是不是英雄就意味着脾气暴躁？他们会有这么多的……体毛吗？看来这些在我身上并不适用。

String.Source: What do you mean, horrible abominations?
String.Dest: 你是指什么？恶心得要命的东西？

String.Source: Did I really call them that? Oh, it sounds much meaner coming out of your mouth. I should probably apologize!
String.Dest: 我真的应该通知他们么？我很抱歉，但是这话从你嘴里说出来真是带点讽刺e!

String.Source: What do you mean, horrible abominations?
String.Dest: 你是指什么？恶心得要命的东西？

String.Source: As to why I said it, well...it's really just all the hair. Hair is good when it's on your head, but anywhere else and it's Dibella's bane.
String.Dest: 正如我为什么这样说, 嗯...我是说所有的毛发. 毛发当长在你头上时是对的, 但是如果长在任何其他地方那就是迪贝拉的错.

String.Source: Either way, I plan on bringing prosperity to the Guild.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我都会为工会带来辉煌。

String.Source: Wait, does that mean you want to bring them down? It's just like with my cousin! I'm so confused. Better I just watch you and figure it out.
String.Dest: 等等，就是说你想把它们拿下来吗？跟我表弟做的一样！我搞不清楚了。最好还是看着你搞定它吧。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. I won't stay with them for long.
String.Dest: 没关系。我不会跟他们呆太久的。

String.Source: Wait, does that mean you will? It's just like with my cousin! I'm so confused. Better I just watch you and figure it out.
String.Dest: 等一下，你的意思是你会咯？简直就像和我的表弟表妹说话！太难懂了。我最好看着你，解决这个问题。

String.Source: Either way, I plan on bringing prosperity to the Guild.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我都会为工会带来辉煌。

String.Source: But for the Guild to prosper, you would have to steal even more than you already have!
String.Dest: But for the Guild to prosper, you would have to steal even more than you already have!

String.Source: Either way, I plan on bringing prosperity to the Guild.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我都会为工会带来辉煌。

String.Source: Everything you're saying right now is completely backwards! Well, I'm going to stick my fingers in my ears until you start making sense!
String.Dest: 现在你说的净是胡言乱语！我呢，堵住耳朵直到你说人话为止。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. I won't stay with them for long.
String.Dest: 没关系。我不会跟他们呆太久的。

String.Source: Oh, thank Dibella. It would have just made things awkward, like with my cousin Fjorn. When the family says his name, they whisper. I hate whispering.
String.Dest: 哦，感谢迪贝拉。事情可能只会变得更糟糕，就像我的表亲菲欧恩那样。当我的家人提到菲欧恩的时候，他们总是窃窃私语。我讨厌窃窃私语。

String.Source: Just from the people I despise. So namely, everyone.
String.Dest: 只是从我瞧不起的人那儿来的，也就是说，你们每个人。

String.Source: Everyone? You mean...even me? Oh no, do you know what this means?
String.Dest: 每个人？你是说……连我也成？哦不，你知道这话意味着什么吗？

String.Source: Just from the people I despise. So namely, everyone.
String.Dest: 只是从我瞧不起的人那儿来的，也就是说，你们每个人。

String.Source: You have that disease where everything you say is the opposite of what you're thinking!
String.Dest: 一直说反话有意思吗，啊？

String.Source: Just from the people I despise. So namely, everyone.
String.Dest: 只是从我瞧不起的人那儿来的，也就是说，你们每个人。

String.Source: I know because my cousin Advar has the very same thing. Some of the thing he says...there's really no other explanation!
String.Dest: 我知道是因为我的表弟Advar也有着类似的事情。他说有些事……真的没有其他解释！

String.Source: Yes, but only from people who deserve it.
String.Dest: 是的，但只能来自值得获取它的人。

String.Source: Hmm....since nobody deserves it, that can only mean the Thieves Guild doesn't steal.
String.Dest: 唔……既然没人活该倒霉，那盗贼公会也没法偷东西了。

String.Source: Yes, but only from people who deserve it.
String.Dest: 是的，但只能来自值得获取它的人。

String.Source: Well, that's a relief. Here I thought I was going to have to slay you.
String.Dest: 呃，现在我放心了。我还以为会不得不杀了你呢。

String.Source: No, they are a guild of skilled alchemists.
String.Dest: 不，他们的工会是由训练有素的炼金术士组成的。

String.Source: Oh...so why are they called thieves? Are they turning people's coins into juniper berries? That still doesn't seem very nice.
String.Dest: 哦……所以为什么他们被称之为盗贼？ 他们把人们的钱变成雪浆果了？ 那看起来依然不是很美。.

String.Source: No, they are a guild of skilled alchemists.
String.Dest: 不，他们的工会是由训练有素的炼金术士组成的。

String.Source: Unless...the name is blatant propaganda against alchemy, brought about by jealous mages! We must do everything in our power to clear their names!
String.Dest: Unless...the name is blatant propaganda against alchemy, brought about by jealous mages! We must do everything in our power to clear their names!

String.Source: If things are operating correctly, then yes.
String.Dest: 如果一切进展顺利，那就Yes！.

String.Source: That...that is not who you are! Clearly you must be going through some personal issues! Maybe...you're even possessed!
String.Dest: 这...这不是你自己！很显然你碰到问题了！或许，你的躯体已经被占据了....

String.Source: If things are operating correctly, then yes.
String.Dest: 如果一切进展顺利，那就Yes！.

String.Source: To that I say, "Shoo ghost! Leave my companion alone!"
String.Dest: 那我就说, "什么鬼东西! 离开我的勇士!"

String.Source: Pretty much. Sorry.
String.Dest: 差不多吧。真对不起。

String.Source: You should be apologizing, but not to me. Repent to the people! Ask the Gods for mercy! Look in the mirror and say, "I am a good person!"
String.Dest: 你应该道歉，但不是对我。向人民忏悔吧！祈求众神的宽容吧！看着镜子说，“我是个好人！”

String.Source: What do you think about joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你觉得加入盗贼工会怎么样？

String.Source: The Thieves Guild? But don't they...steal things?
String.Dest: 盗贼公会？可他们不是偷东西的吗？

String.Source: (Blood's Honor) What do you think of the Companions being Werewolves?
String.Dest: （血之荣耀） 你对战友团成员变成狼人有什么看法？

String.Source: I don't really know much about werewolves, other than the fact that they're horrible abominations.
String.Dest: 我并不是特别了解狼人，除了他们狰狞卑劣的事实以外，我对他们一无所知。

String.Source: (Blood's Honor) What do you think of the Companions being Werewolves?
String.Dest: （血之荣耀） 你对战友团成员变成狼人有什么看法？

String.Source: Although the Companions do a lot of good deeds, so I guess it evens out.
String.Dest: 尽管战友团有一堆光辉事迹，但我猜那才刚好扯平。

String.Source: Wait...what do you mean by bags of them?
String.Dest: 等等......用袋子装他们是什麽意思？

String.Source: Oh, I find them everywhere. In streams, under rocks, even in food barrels. I think Zenithar is trying to tell me something.
String.Dest: 噢，我在哪都能找到这东西。小河里头，石头底下，甚至食物桶里头都有。我想泽尼萨尔正试图告诉我些什么。

String.Source: Wait...what do you mean by bags of them?
String.Dest: 等等......用袋子装他们是什麽意思？

String.Source: Can you imagine, two Gods fighting over my services? Oh, it's almost scandalous!
String.Dest: 两个神居然因我的侍奉而发生争执，你能想象吗？哦，这也太可耻了。

String.Source: Wait...what do you mean by bags of them?
String.Dest: 等等......用袋子装他们是什麽意思？

String.Source: But tell your mother, tell your friends! I would never leave Dibella.
String.Dest: 但去跟你母亲和你朋友说！我是绝不会背离迪贝拉的。

String.Source: That system will leave you starving and cold.
String.Dest: 那个系统会让你觉得又冷又饿。

String.Source: I have the Gods' warmth to keep me company. And if it got really cold, I could just kill a bear. They're everywhere.
String.Dest: I have the Gods' warmth to keep me company. And if it got really cold, I could just kill a bear. They're everywhere.

String.Source: That system will leave you starving and cold.
String.Dest: 那个系统会让你觉得又冷又饿。

String.Source: No fires though. I once tried to start one, and it almost burned down an entire grove! Dibella would have never forgiven me.
String.Dest: 不过不能生火。我以前尝试过一次，几乎把整个树林都给烧的一干二净。要是真烧光了，迪贝拉永远都不会原谅我的。

String.Source: That only adds up to 9 gold pieces.
String.Dest: 这不仅增加了9个金币。

String.Source: Oh, I forgot, 1 gold piece goes to spreading Dibella's word. Can you believe the cost of ink and paper these days?
String.Dest: 哦，我忘了。算上传播迪贝拉的福音，还有一金币。你相信最近墨水和纸有多贵吗？

String.Source: That only adds up to 9 gold pieces.
String.Dest: 这不仅增加了9个金币。

String.Source: One time, I didn't have any gold, so I carved my petition to change the name of Bloated Man's Grotto on the wall of the Jarl's Longhouse.
String.Dest: 【我曾经一度很缺钱，于是我在领主长屋的墙上改变了傲慢者石窟的所有者】。

String.Source: That only adds up to 9 gold pieces.
String.Dest: 这不仅增加了9个金币。

String.Source: The guards were none too pleased. But really? Bloated Man? Why not call it Handsome Man's Grotto?
String.Dest: 这守卫们都有点不开心啊。是不是真的？傲慢者？为什么不管它叫大帅哥石窟呢？

String.Source: I have my own system. For every 10 gold, 10 goes to beer.
String.Dest: 我有我自己的原则，我的每10个金币都会花去喝酒。

String.Source: I don't get it. If you spent it that way, you would have nothing but beer. You're strange.
String.Dest: 我可没法理解这种原则。如果你那样花钱的话，你除了啤酒以外就啥都没有了不是么。你可真够奇怪的。

String.Source: I have my own system. For every 10 gold, 10 goes to beer.
String.Dest: 我有我自己的原则，我的每10个金币都会花去喝酒。

String.Source: They used to say I was the same. Strange girl, they said. Then I became one of Dibella's soldiers. Now they just call me devoted.
String.Dest: 他们以前也那样说我，说我是个奇怪的女孩。后来我成了迪贝拉的卫士。于是现在他们都说我是奉献者。

String.Source: Do you ever explore caves for treasure?
String.Dest: 你有过为了宝藏而探索洞穴的经历吗？

String.Source: Of course! What do you think all this is? It's more valuable than any gold coin!
String.Dest: 当然!你觉得这一切都是？它比金币更有价值!

String.Source: Do you ever explore caves for treasure?
String.Dest: 你有过为了宝藏而探索洞穴的经历吗？

String.Source: Now if I find a gold coin, and I do find them often...bags of them, in fact, I deliver them straight to the donation bowl.
String.Dest: 如果我现在能捡到一枚金币，以后也能经常捡到一袋袋的金币，老实说，我会直接把它们捐掉的。

String.Source: Do you ever explore caves for treasure?
String.Dest: 你有过为了宝藏而探索洞穴的经历吗？

String.Source: I even have a system. For every 10 gold pieces, 7 goes to the temple, 1 goes toward food and shelter, and 1 goes to alms for the poor.
String.Dest: 我曾经拥有一套系统。每次10金币，7个去神庙，1个去旅馆，还有1个去施舍穷人。

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: M-mine? But we barely met. Oh Gods, are you going to show me your Amulet of Mara? Do I say yes? Things are all moving so fast!
String.Dest: 我……我？但我们都没见过几次面。哦众神啊，你是把玛拉护身符给我看的吗？我说对了？这……这太快了！

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: The tree! Yes! You were talking about the tree! Of course you were! You think I own it! But alas, I do not! Nobody does!
String.Dest: 树！是的！你是说树！你当然是在说了！你认为我拥有它！但是，唉，我不！没有人拥有！

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: That's the beauty of nature. It belongs to no Jarl, no Emperor, no king!
String.Dest: 那就是自然之美。不属于任何领主，任何皇帝，任何国王！

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: M-mine? But we barely met. Oh Gods, are you going to show me your Amulet of Mara?
String.Dest: 我……我吗？但我们没见过几次面啊。哦天哪，你真的是在给我看你的玛拉护身符吗？

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: The tree! Yes! You were talking about the tree! Of course you were! You think I own it! But alas, I do not! Nobody does!
String.Dest: 树！是的！你是说树！你当然是在说了！你认为我拥有它！但是，唉，我不！没有人拥有！

String.Source: I too am an admirer of beauty. Namely, yours.
String.Dest: 我也特别爱戴美丽，也就是，你的美丽！

String.Source: That's the beauty of nature. It belongs to no Jarl, no Emperor, no king!
String.Dest: 那就是自然之美。不属于任何领主，任何皇帝，任何国王！

String.Source: I thought all you Dibella worshippers were just harlots.
String.Dest: 我以为你们这些迪贝拉信徒都是妓女。

String.Source: You're mistaken. Dibella is the Goddess of art and beauty.
String.Dest: You're mistaken. Dibella is the Goddess of art and beauty.

String.Source: I thought all you Dibella worshippers were just harlots.
String.Dest: 我以为你们这些迪贝拉信徒都是妓女。

String.Source: Those priestesses at the Temple in Markarth just tend to be the loudest among us, to the point they drown out all other voices.
String.Dest: 马卡斯城神殿的那些女祭司们是我们当中嗓门最大的，一到关键点她们的声音就覆盖了所有其他的响动。

String.Source: I thought all you Dibella worshippers were just harlots.
String.Dest: 我以为你们这些迪贝拉信徒都是妓女。

String.Source: Well, good luck trying to drown out mine! I'm going to shout, cry, and clamor to all who will listen, and all who refuse to!
String.Dest: 我会跟所有人大声宣扬的，就算她们不想听我也会硬灌进她们的耳朵里去！想让我闭嘴？呵呵，祝她们好运！

String.Source: I thought all you Dibella worshippers were just harlots.
String.Dest: 我以为你们这些迪贝拉信徒都是妓女。

String.Source: Nature is where Dibella truly sparkles! Do you see it, friend? Do you see her light?
String.Dest: 自然就是迪贝拉真正的火花！你看到它了吗，朋友？你看到她的光芒了吗？

String.Source: Yes, and like the explorer, we must map and spread word of our findings.
String.Dest: 没错。并且我们必须像个探险家一样，把我们发现的东西绘制成地图，写成书并出版。

String.Source: That's the spirit! But don't just spread the word, shout it! Scream it from the pit of your stomach!
String.Dest: 那才是好样的！但别只是简单说说，喊出来！从你的内心深处大喊出来！

String.Source: Yes, and like the explorer, we must map and spread word of our findings.
String.Dest: 没错。并且我们必须像个探险家一样，把我们发现的东西绘制成地图，写成书并出版。

String.Source: If I see an ear, I lend it my voice, so that it'll ring inside it for all eternity.
String.Dest: 如果我瞧见一只耳朵，就会把自己的声音借给它，这样它就会在耳朵里永远的发出响声。

String.Source: I'm not saying nature isn't nice. It's just not as important as you think.
String.Dest: 我不是说天性不好，而是没有你想的那么重要。

String.Source: What could be more important than tribute to the Gods? Why worship them in dusty halls when we can come to these cathedrals of nature?
String.Dest: 什么能比祭献神灵更为重要？ 为什么不去那些野外的祭台而在这破败的大厅里参拜?

String.Source: I'm not saying nature isn't nice. It's just not as important as you think.
String.Dest: 我不是说天性不好，而是没有你想的那么重要。

String.Source: We have to let them know these places exist.
String.Dest: 我们要让他们知道这些地方的存在。

String.Source: I'm not saying nature isn't nice. It's just not as important as you think.
String.Dest: 我不是说天性不好，而是没有你想的那么重要。

String.Source: We have to shout it from the tabletops. Then the rooftops! Then the mountaintops! Every top, bottom, and middle!
String.Dest: 我们会从桌面上开始喊它。然后是屋顶！再然后是山顶！每一个顶上，半山腰，还有山脚下！

String.Source: I'm not saying nature isn't nice. It's just not as important as you think.
String.Dest: 我不是说天性不好，而是没有你想的那么重要。

String.Source: I'm shouting all the time! Are you?
String.Dest: 我一直在大喊！是吗？

String.Source: True, but Dibella beckons me to explore the mortal form.
String.Dest: 确实是，可迪贝拉指引我去探索人类形态。

String.Source: I do not doubt we mortals make for beautiful pottery, but we see that beauty every day.
String.Dest: I do not doubt we mortals make for beautiful pottery, but we see that beauty every day.

String.Source: True, but Dibella beckons me to explore the mortal form.
String.Dest: 确实是，可迪贝拉指引我去探索人类形态。

String.Source: I want to bring Dibella's full portfolio to the world. And to do that, we need to be more than adventurers.
String.Dest: 我想把迪贝拉所有的作品都展示给全世界。要完成这个，我们就不能仅仅只扮演探险者这一角色了。

String.Source: True, but Dibella beckons me to explore the mortal form.
String.Dest: 确实是，可迪贝拉指引我去探索人类形态。

String.Source: We must be couriers, gossipers, town criers, screaming from the bell towers while we shower the people with our missives.
String.Dest: 当我们向民众散播教义时我们要把自己当作信使、爱闲聊的人、街头公告员般在钟楼上大声叫喊。

String.Source: You seem like someone who appreciates nature.
String.Dest: 你看起来是那种会感谢大自然的人。

String.Source: Oh yes, the water, the animals, the trees...all clay which Dibella molds into indelible art.
String.Dest: 是啊，流水，动物，树木……所有的一切都是迪贝拉塑造的永恒艺术品。

String.Source: You seem like someone who appreciates nature.
String.Dest: 你看起来是那种会感谢大自然的人。

String.Source: And at the heart of every explorer is an admirer of that beauty.
String.Dest: 并且每个探险家的内心深处都是美好之物的崇拜者。

String.Source: We don't have time to be buying gifts for your uncle's cousin's pet frog.
String.Dest: 我们没有时间去给你的叔叔的表哥的宠物青蛙买礼物。

String.Source: Oh Gods, that reminds me! It's his wedding anniversary too! The cousin, not the frog.
String.Dest: Oh Gods, that reminds me! It's his wedding anniversary too! The cousin, not the frog.

String.Source: We don't have time to be buying gifts for your uncle's cousin's pet frog.
String.Dest: 我们没有时间去给你的叔叔的表哥的宠物青蛙买礼物。

String.Source: And besides, we don't have to make a detour. If we happen to go by Solitude, then maybe we can cast our reading nets and trawl for ideas!
String.Dest: 此外，我们不必非得走弯路。 如果我们碰巧要去独孤城，那也许我们能拓展一下自己的阅读面，多网罗一些想法!

String.Source: Alright, let's head on over to the College to get some ideas.
String.Dest: 好吧，让我们前往学院找些点子。

String.Source: To the College then! All hands on deck! Cast the reading nets! Let no good idea swim away!
String.Dest: To the College then! All hands on deck! Cast the reading nets! Let no good idea swim away!

String.Source: You don't have to be a student to make art.
String.Dest: 你无需去当一个学生也能进行艺术创作。

String.Source: You mean, make something original? Wow, that's a great idea! I wonder why I never thought of that!
String.Dest: 你的意思是，做一些独创的东西？哇，那真是个好主意！为什么我就没有想到呢！

String.Source: You don't have to be a student to make art.
String.Dest: 你无需去当一个学生也能进行艺术创作。

String.Source: Where do we start! How do we start? I'm ready to make something worthy of Dibella, just point the way!
String.Dest: 我们怎么开始！我们从哪里开始?我已经准备好为迪贝拉做一些好事了,只要告诉我该怎么做!

String.Source: So what do we need to do, borrow something from another student?
String.Dest: 那么现在我们需要做什么，从另一个学生那借点东西？

String.Source: I tried that once, but those Bards College students don't like to share. It's very impolite of them. I'm more than willing to share my discoveries.
String.Dest: 我以前试过，可那些诗人学院的学生不喜欢分享。他们很不礼貌。我可是很乐于跟别人分享自己的发现的。

String.Source: So what do we need to do, borrow something from another student?
String.Dest: 那么现在我们需要做什么，从另一个学生那借点东西？

String.Source: I wonder if it's possible to compose something of my own? I mean, how hard could be? Dibella will be writing most of it anyway!
String.Dest: 我不知道能不能写点儿自己的东西？我是说，怎么可能？无论如何迪贝拉都会去写大部分的内容！

String.Source: You're a grown woman. You should tell your parents the truth.
String.Dest: 妹子，你已然长大成人了，还是把真相告诉你爹妈吧。

String.Source: I don't think that's a good idea. I don't think my Pa's heart could take it. The real problem is finding something they haven't heard.
String.Dest: I don't think that's a good idea. I don't think my Pa's heart could take it. The real problem is finding something they haven't heard.

String.Source: You're a grown woman. You should tell your parents the truth.
String.Dest: 妹子，你已然长大成人了，还是把真相告诉你爹妈吧。

String.Source: Last time I picked some obscure poem about Giants, and they already knew the words. They scolded me for trying to pass it off as my own.
String.Dest: 上次我摘取了一些关于巨人的朦胧诗，并且他们已经知道了这些句子。他们骂我想把这些诗当作我自己的。

String.Source: You're a grown woman. You should tell your parents the truth.
String.Dest: 妹子，你已然长大成人了，还是把真相告诉你爹妈吧。

String.Source: I wonder if it's possible to compose something of my own? I mean, how hard could be? Dibella will be writing most of it anyway!
String.Dest: 我不知道能不能写点儿自己的东西？我是说，怎么可能？无论如何迪贝拉都会去写大部分的内容！

String.Source: Wait. What did you tell your parents you were doing?
String.Dest: 等下，你到底是怎么跟你父母说你正在做的事的？

String.Source: Well, as the youngest of 8 children, the only way Ma and Pa would let me out of the house is if I stayed clear of danger.
String.Dest: 呃，作为八个孩子里最小的那个，只有在我呆在房子里有切实危险的时候，爸妈才会让我离开。

String.Source: Wait. What did you tell your parents you were doing?
String.Dest: 等下，你到底是怎么跟你父母说你正在做的事的？

String.Source: That usually means staying inside. No place for a soldier of Dibella.
String.Dest: 一般来说，意思是“在里面待好”。没有迪贝拉的战士的份儿。

String.Source: Wait. What did you tell your parents you were doing?
String.Dest: 等下，你到底是怎么跟你父母说你正在做的事的？

String.Source: Although granted, back then I was just a kid with a pair of adventure boots and Pa's old war sword.
String.Dest: 虽然获得准许，可那时我只是个穿着双冒险者靴子拿着老爸旧剑的小孩。

String.Source: Wait. What did you tell your parents you were doing?
String.Dest: 等下，你到底是怎么跟你父母说你正在做的事的？

String.Source: But now it's too late! I've been knighted by beauty! There's no turning back! Turn me around, and I'll run backwards!
String.Dest: 可是太迟了啦！我已经因美丽而加冠进爵！那里没有回头路！就算把我转个身，我也会倒退着跑向前方！

String.Source: I suggest a mudcrab chitin and some raw meat.
String.Dest: 我建议蟹腿和一些生肉。

String.Source: Oh no, that's exactly the kind of thing we don't want to get. We can't let my parents know I'm an adventurer.
String.Dest: Oh no, that's exactly the kind of thing we don't want to get. We can't let my parents know I'm an adventurer.

String.Source: It's hard to buy a gift if you don't know who it's for.
String.Dest: 要买一件连你都不知道送给谁的礼物是很困难的。.

String.Source: Oh, it's always the same gift. What else does a student of the Bards College get besides a song or a poem?
String.Dest: 噢，总是一样的【礼物】啊。吟游诗人学院 的学生除了诗词歌赋之外还能得到什么？

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: Oh, it's not something I have to think too hard about.
String.Dest: 哦，没什么事儿值得我这么努力的想。

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: Given I'm supposed to be a student at the Bards College, my parents expect nothing short of an original poem or composition.
String.Dest: 考虑到我本该是吟游诗人学院的学生，我的父母期望我华文藻词出口成章。

String.Source: Gold. It's a gift that can be anything you want.
String.Dest: 金子。就是你想要什么就能变成什么的礼物。

String.Source: Yes, it's absolutely perfect, if you're lazy and impolite. Is that what people think of me? Gods, I hope not.
String.Dest: 好吧，如果你就这么又懒又粗鲁的话，那就太完美了。人们是这么看我的吗？众神啊，我希望不是。

String.Source: Gold. It's a gift that can be anything you want.
String.Dest: 金子。就是你想要什么就能变成什么的礼物。

String.Source: My parents might actually realize I'm not a bard.
String.Dest: My parents might actually realize I'm not a bard.

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 有什么关系么?

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 出了什么事吗？

String.Source: Yes, I think tomorrow is my cousin's sister's fiance's birthday! Or was it my sister's fiance's cousin?
String.Dest: 是啊 ，我想明天好像是我侄子的妹妹的未婚夫的生日！噢或者是我妹妹的未婚夫的侄子？

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 有什么关系么?

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 出了什么事吗？

String.Source: Well, it's somebody's birthday, and I need to get them a gift!
String.Dest: 嗯，这是某个人的生日，而我需要给他们买一份礼物！

String.Source: I imagine it must have been difficult getting attention growing up.
String.Dest: 我可以想象要在成长过程中获得充分的关注是有多么困难。

String.Source: Oh, whenever I felt neglected, I just raised my voice. Ma said if I kept shouting, one day it would get stuck. And she was right!
String.Dest: 啊，每当我被忽视的时候，我就提高我的声音。妈妈说如果我一直大喊大叫，总有一天会卡住的。事实证明她是正确的！

String.Source: I imagine it must have been difficult getting attention growing up.
String.Dest: 我可以想象要在成长过程中获得充分的关注是有多么困难。

String.Source: Speaking of family, I just remembered something!
String.Dest: 说到家人，我刚刚想起一件事！

String.Source: When are you going to introduce me to some of them?
String.Dest: 你什么时候才肯把我介绍给他们呐？

String.Source: Hm...that's a good question. I guess whenever we happen to run into one of them. It would be rude if I didn't introduce you then.
String.Dest: 恩吗...好问题哈。我觉得不论何时我们遇到他们，如果我不向他们介绍你都会显得很粗鲁.

String.Source: When are you going to introduce me to some of them?
String.Dest: 你什么时候才肯把我介绍给他们呐？

String.Source: Speaking of family, I just remembered something!
String.Dest: 说到家人，我刚刚想起一件事！

String.Source: Are you close to most of your relatives?
String.Dest: 你跟你的家人亲近吗？

String.Source: Well, I don't see any of them here. So I'd say they're pretty far from the both of us. That's a strange question.
String.Dest: 好吧，我没在这儿见到他们之中的任何人。我想说他们离我俩相当远。这真是个奇怪的问题。

String.Source: Are you close to most of your relatives?
String.Dest: 你跟你的家人亲近吗？

String.Source: Speaking of family, I just remembered something!
String.Dest: 说到家人，我刚刚想起一件事！

String.Source: That's a rather large extended family.
String.Dest: 那真是个庞大的家庭.

String.Source: It would be larger, but some of them are in Sovngarde. I think that's south of Helgen. I'm not sure.
String.Dest: 它将会更大 , 但他们中的一些人在松加德。我认为这地方是南方的圣地镇。但我不确定。

String.Source: That's a rather large extended family.
String.Dest: 那真是个庞大的家庭.

String.Source: Speaking of family, I just remembered something!
String.Dest: 说到家人，我刚刚想起一件事！

String.Source: I just hope this thing will give us the knowledge to vanquish our foes.
String.Dest: 我只希望这件东西能为我们如何该打倒敌人提供点信息。

String.Source: Oh, don't worry, it will. And if it doesn't, then there will be something else. Keep a positive attitude and good things will happen!
String.Dest: 哦，别着急，一切都会好的。如果没有的话那就会出现一些别的什么东西来补救。保持一个积极乐观的态度，然后就会有好事发生的！

String.Source: I'm not sure this scroll will have any of the three.
String.Dest: 我不确定这里有三个卷轴。

String.Source: What do you mean? What else could it be? Are you saying...are you saying it talks? That's amazing! Let's go find it and have a conversation!
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？它还能是什么？你是在说...你是在说它讲话了？这太不可思议了！让我们找到它然后和它谈谈！

String.Source: Good. I was worried this scroll wouldn't have pictures.
String.Dest: 太好了，我还担心万一卷轴里没有图画怎么办呢。

String.Source: You and me both. Reading is fine if you have a good imagination, or if the author can't draw. Otherwise, there's really no substitute.
String.Dest: You and me both. Reading is fine if you have a good imagination, or if the author can't draw. Otherwise, there's really no substitute.

String.Source: What do you mean directions? Like to the market?
String.Dest: 你说的方向是什么意思？比如市场？

String.Source: If your quest is to buy some silverware or a piece of fresh venison, then sure, that's exactly what it will tell you!
String.Dest: If your quest is to buy some silverware or a piece of fresh venison, then sure, that's exactly what it will tell you!

String.Source: You're a great help as always, Amalee.
String.Dest: 你总能给我莫大的帮助，艾米莉。

String.Source: Thanks! You too!
String.Dest: 谢谢！你也一样！

String.Source: (Temple of Dibella) Did you ever even consider becoming a priestess?
String.Dest: ( 迪贝拉神庙) 你考虑过当女祭司吗？

String.Source: No, never. I couldn't spend my days in a dusty old temple. I heard the sisters don't even speak to their families.
String.Dest: No, never. I couldn't spend my days in a dusty old temple. I heard the sisters don't even speak to their families.

String.Source: (Temple of Dibella) Did you ever even consider becoming a priestess?
String.Dest: ( 迪贝拉神庙) 你考虑过当女祭司吗？

String.Source: As the youngest of 8 children, I find that inexcusable.
String.Dest: As the youngest of 8 children, I find that inexcusable.

String.Source: (Temple of Dibella) Did you ever even consider becoming a priestess?
String.Dest: ( 迪贝拉神庙) 你考虑过当女祭司吗？

String.Source: As the niece to 12 aunts and uncles, and the proud relative of 24 cousins, I say, shame on them!
String.Dest: 作为12个叔叔阿姨的侄女，还有24个骄傲的堂表亲戚，我得说，真是各种丢脸！

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) What do you think is written on this Elder Scroll?
String.Dest: （上古知识）你觉得上古卷轴里写了些什么？

String.Source: Directions, probably. Words, definitely. Pictures, maybe. All three? One can only hope!
String.Dest: 指引？很可能。对话？当然会。图画？也许。所有这三个？你只能期望会这样！

String.Source: Dibella's Art.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉的艺术。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Lunar Lake Serenada.
String.Dest: Lunar Lake Serenada.

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Dibella's Art.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉的艺术。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: The Dragonborn Comes.
String.Dest: 龙裔降临。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: I'd like to hear "Wolves of Jorrvaskr."
String.Dest: 我喜欢听《月瓦斯卡群狼》

String.Source: I'm still trying to work out the melody. Sorry.
String.Dest: 我还在试着搞出个旋律来，抱歉。

String.Source: I'd like to hear "Wolves of Jorrvaskr."
String.Dest: 我喜欢听《月瓦斯卡群狼》

String.Source: That song is a bit violent. But I guess so is "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 这首歌有点不和谐。 但我掂量着该叫它 "红衣拉格纳."

String.Source: A jovial song. "Mogo's Mead."
String.Dest: 一首快乐的歌。 "莫戈的蜂蜜酒."

String.Source: I'm still trying to work out the melody. Sorry.
String.Dest: 我还在试着搞出个旋律来，抱歉。

String.Source: A jovial song. "Mogo's Mead."
String.Dest: 一首快乐的歌。 "莫戈的蜂蜜酒."

String.Source: I love that song! It always gets the place moving.
String.Dest: 我爱这首歌！它总是能让气氛活跃起来。

String.Source: But that song is so depressing! Alright...if that's what you want.
String.Dest: 可那首歌多哀伤啊！好吧，要是你确实要听的话。

String.Source: Play "Tears of the Hist."
String.Dest: 演奏"希斯之泪"。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Never mind.
String.Dest: 算了。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Lunar Lake Seranada.
String.Dest: Lunar Lake Seranada.

String.Source: I'm still trying to work out the melody. Sorry.
String.Dest: 我还在试着搞出个旋律来，抱歉。

String.Source: I want to hear "Dusk on Anvil Harbor."
String.Dest: 我想听那首《铁砧港上的暮色》。

String.Source: I don't really like sad songs. Well, I'll just have to do my best to make them more uplifting!
String.Dest: 我真的不喜欢伤感的歌曲。呃，我会尽力把它们弹得更欢快的！

String.Source: I want to hear "Dusk on Anvil Harbor."
String.Dest: 我想听那首《铁砧港上的暮色》。

String.Source: Why yes! I learned how to play the lute when I was little. Although I'd much rather play the harp. I'm sure that's what Dibella would want.
String.Dest: 啊对啊！我从小就学习演奏鲁特琴了。虽然我更喜欢弹竖琴。我想那才是 迪贝拉 喜欢的乐器吧。

String.Source: Do you have any other talents besides exploring?
String.Dest: 除了探险你还有其他天赋么？

String.Source: What would you like me to play?
String.Dest: 那我要扮演个什么角色？

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: What would you like me to play?
String.Dest: 那我要扮演个什么角色？

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: You would? I mean, of course you would! Just give me a moment...
String.Dest: You would? I mean, of course you would! Just give me a moment...

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: You would? I mean, of course you would! Just give me a moment...
String.Dest: You would? I mean, of course you would! Just give me a moment...

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: I would like to hear you play your lute.
String.Dest: 我想听你弹琴。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: I want to go back to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 让我们回到先前的问题上。

String.Source: Oh, that didn't come until after I became an adventurer. I was deep in some nameless cave, winding my way down toward the bottom of the earth.
String.Dest: 噢，那是直到我成为一个冒险者之后的事。有一次我在一个不知道名字的洞穴里，慢慢走向大地的深处……

String.Source: Markarth would explain the fascination with Dibella.
String.Dest: 马卡斯城可以解释迪贝拉的迷人之处。

String.Source: Suddenly, the passage opened up, and I found myself in this in a hidden grotto, with a pond and trees and holes in the roof.
String.Dest: 通道突然之间打了开来，我发现我自己身处一个隐藏的岩穴中，周围有池塘和树木，岩穴顶上还有几个洞。

String.Source: Markarth would explain the fascination with Dibella.
String.Dest: 马卡斯城可以解释迪贝拉的迷人之处。

String.Source: I don't think my eyes closed for another week. I couldn't breathe, I couldn't sleep. The beauty I witnessed was ten times more important.
String.Dest: 我不认为我看走眼了。我不能呼吸，也难以成眠。我所见证的美丽至关重要。

String.Source: Markarth would explain the fascination with Dibella.
String.Dest: 马卡斯城可以解释迪贝拉的迷人之处。

String.Source: That happened before I was born. But I'm not a greenthumb, honest.
String.Dest: 那些都发生在我出生之前。但老实说，我不是什么种植好手。

String.Source: Were you in Markarth during the Forsworn Rebellion?
String.Dest: 弃誓者叛乱时，你人在马卡斯吗？

String.Source: I'm five months past a woman grown. I've killed a bear, drank my first mead, and can pitch a tent if you need it.
String.Dest: 我已经成年五个月啦。我杀过一头熊，喝了第一瓶酒，而且有必要的话还能搭帐篷。

String.Source: Were you in Markarth during the Forsworn Rebellion?
String.Dest: 弃誓者叛乱时，你人在马卡斯吗？

String.Source: I found clubbing things with a mace is pretty effective...and also pretty ugly. Not pretty at all, actually.
String.Dest: 我发现棒槌一样的权杖是相当有效的……也很丑。特别的丑！真的。

String.Source: What sort of weapon do you prefer?
String.Dest: 你喜欢哪种武器？r?

String.Source: As a soldier of Dibella, I have a reputation to uphold. Dibella's reputation.
String.Dest: 作为一名迪贝拉的士兵，我誓死拥护迪贝拉的声誉。

String.Source: What sort of weapon do you prefer?
String.Dest: 你喜欢哪种武器？r?

String.Source: Beauty even in battle is very, very important, and I'll die with a sword in my hands before I live with a mace.
String.Dest: 即使是在战斗中，美丽也是非常，非常重要的。比起使用狼牙棒苟延残喘，我宁愿手里攥着剑的死去。

String.Source: What sort of weapon do you prefer?
String.Dest: 你喜欢哪种武器？r?

String.Source: The barracks have...charm, but I want fresh air and blue skies and forests that are woollier than a mammoth.
String.Dest: 军营有……它自己的魅力,但我想要新鲜的空气和蓝色的天空和森林,还有比猛犸更狂野的动物。

String.Source: Why didn't you join the guard or military?
String.Dest: 你为什么不成为守卫或者为军队效力呢？

String.Source: Although I guess the barracks is kind of like a forest. There's a lot of wood and bugs and things. We used to call it Termites' Reach.
String.Dest: 虽然我猜想军营跟森林什么的差不多。有很多木头和虫子什么的，我们都管它叫 Termites' Reach.

String.Source: Why didn't you join the guard or military?
String.Dest: 你为什么不成为守卫或者为军队效力呢？

String.Source: Ma and Pa fought for the Empire during the Great War. Although I don't see what's so great about it. I'm sure it's over my head.
String.Dest: 我跟帕在世界大战中与帝国对抗。虽然我并不觉得这是什么好事。这件事不是我能理解的。

String.Source: What skills do you possess as an adventurer?
String.Dest: 作为一个冒险家你有什么技能？

String.Source: They're the ones who taught me everything I know. About battle, that is. It's not like they had to teach me about exploring. That I taught myself.
String.Dest: 是他们教给了我所知的一切。当然仅限于战斗上，至于探索不是他们教的，是我自己学会的。

String.Source: What skills do you possess as an adventurer?
String.Dest: 作为一个冒险家你有什么技能？

String.Source: Although growing up in the Reach helped. First thing you learn is how to deal with heights. After that, Dwarven ruins are a cinch.
String.Dest: 尽管生长在瑞驰有所帮助，但你学会的第一件事情应该是如何解决高度问题。在那之后，矮人遗迹就是小菜一碟。

String.Source: What skills do you possess as an adventurer?
String.Dest: 作为一个冒险家你有什么技能？

String.Source: Will you look at this tree! They say beauty is in the eye of the beholder, but it's remarkable how often those eyes are mine.
String.Dest: 你看这棵树!他们说美丽之物是存在于旁观者眼里的, 但值得注意的是 ，那双善于发现美的眼睛经常是我的。

String.Source: Why aren't there more people here? Tours must be organized! Paintings commissioned!
String.Dest: 怎么这里就这么点儿人？观光必须得好好组织啊！还得委托别人把这美景画下来！

String.Source: It's our duty as adventurers to bring the people to the tree and the tree to the people!
String.Dest: 这是我们冒险家的职责，带给人们树还有树还有树还有树！

String.Source: Surely you are not referring to the Eldergleam! Its majesty is as plain as the nose on my face.
String.Dest: 当然了你根本就没提起古藤圣所！他的威严就像是我脸上的鼻子一样清晰可见。

String.Source: This eyesore pains me deeply. Perhaps I will wash out its memory in the stream.
String.Dest: 那个丑八怪，瞎了我的狗眼。或许我得到小溪里洗洗才行。

String.Source: Something must have obstructed your view. Bats? Torchbugs? They can sometimes be distracting. We need to make sure the lighting here is optimal.
String.Dest: 肯定是蝙蝠或者Torchbugs挡住了你的视线。它们有时就是那么的让人分心。我们得保证这里的光照是最佳的。

String.Source: This eyesore pains me deeply. Perhaps I will wash out its memory in the stream.
String.Dest: 那个丑八怪，瞎了我的狗眼。或许我得到小溪里洗洗才行。

String.Source: Yes! Dispatch the couriers! Have the Jarls make a decree! To each and every citizen of this land, I say, open your eyes, and behold its beauty!
String.Dest: 对！派遣信使！向这片土地的每一位公民传达领主的命令！我说，睁大你的双眼，欣赏它的美好！

String.Source: This tree is indeed magnificent. We must inform everyone of its splendor.
String.Dest: 这棵树实在是宏伟，我们必须告诉所有人它的壮丽之处。

String.Source: Oh no, the Gods made such wonders as gifts to the mortals.
String.Dest: 噢不，上帝创造了这些奇迹，作为送给凡人的礼物。

String.Source: My duty as an adventurer is to go on adventures. It's fairly self-explanatory.
String.Dest: 作为冒险者我到处冒险就行了，很容易自圆其说。

String.Source: If we don't share their splendor with the people, we are no better than heathens. You don't want to be a heathen, do you? I certainly don't.
String.Dest: If we don't share their splendor with the people, we are no better than heathens. You don't want to be a heathen, do you? I certainly don't.

String.Source: My duty as an adventurer is to go on adventures. It's fairly self-explanatory.
String.Dest: 作为冒险者我到处冒险就行了，很容易自圆其说。

String.Source: If you want to see a more majestic tree, then you ought to see me naked.
String.Dest: 如果你想看到一个更加雄伟的树，那么你应该先看看我的裸体。

String.Source: Naked? What in Dibella do you mean by...
String.Dest: Naked? What in Dibella do you mean by...

String.Source: If you want to see a more majestic tree, then you ought to see me naked.
String.Dest: 如果你想看到一个更加雄伟的树，那么你应该先看看我的裸体。

String.Source: Ohhhh...but, um, such beauty would be far too much for my eyes to behold.
String.Dest: 这样的美景让我目不胜收。

String.Source: If you want beauty, you should see me naked. The mountain view is spectacular.
String.Dest: 如果你想见识下何谓美丽，那你只要看看我的裸体就知道了，我的双峰可是非常壮观的。

String.Source: Naked? What in Dibella do you mean by...
String.Dest: Naked? What in Dibella do you mean by...

String.Source: If you want beauty, you should see me naked. The mountain view is spectacular.
String.Dest: 如果你想见识下何谓美丽，那你只要看看我的裸体就知道了，我的双峰可是非常壮观的。

String.Source: Ohhhh...but, um, such beauty would be far too much for my eyes to behold.
String.Dest: 这样的美景让我目不胜收。

String.Source: Not really. Those priestesses do enough of that on their own. It's not like you poisoned a lake or something. That I wouldn't forgive.
String.Dest: Not really. Those priestesses do enough of that on their own. It's not like you poisoned a lake or something. That I wouldn't forgive.

String.Source: Are you angry I defiled the temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: Are you angry I defiled the temple of Dibella?

String.Source: I don't know, do you think he'll be alright? I've heard of people who drink so much they blackout.
String.Dest: I don't know, do you think he'll be alright? I've heard of people who drink so much they blackout.

String.Source: What do you think happened to Sam?
String.Dest: What do you think happened to Sam?

String.Source: Supposedly it's a sickness of some kind. I would pray to Dibella you didn't catch it.
String.Dest: Supposedly it's a sickness of some kind. I would pray to Dibella you didn't catch it.

String.Source: What do you think happened to Sam?
String.Dest: What do you think happened to Sam?

String.Source: Well, my uncle Ygram used to say he was married to a goat. But it turns out he was talking about his wife.
String.Dest: Well, my uncle Ygram used to say he was married to a goat. But it turns out he was talking about his wife.

String.Source: The priestess mentionet marriage and a goat. Sound familiar to you?
String.Dest: The priestess mentionet marriage and a goat. Sound familiar to you?

String.Source: I guess we should head on over to Rorikstead and see what we can find out.
String.Dest: I guess we should head on over to Rorikstead and see what we can find out.

String.Source: The priestess mentionet marriage and a goat. Sound familiar to you?
String.Dest: The priestess mentionet marriage and a goat. Sound familiar to you?

String.Source: What exactly happened? I feel dirty just asking.
String.Dest: What exactly happened? I feel dirty just asking.

String.Source: (Night to Remember) It seems I got drunk and trashed the Temple of Dibella.
String.Dest: (Night to Remember) It seems I got drunk and trashed the Temple of Dibella.

String.Source: {Intro}
String.Dest: {介绍}

String.Source: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart! I tell you, I tell you, the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 【原版歌词替换】英雄，英雄，勇者无惧。我告诉你，我告诉你，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: With a Voice wielding power of the ancient Nord art; Believe, believe the Dragornborn comes;
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】诺德技艺，龙吼回归。没错，没错，他是龙裔。

String.Source: It's an end to the evil, of all Skyrim's foes; Beware, beware the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 终结邪恶，敌人的末日。当心，当心，龙裔出世。

String.Source: For the darkness has passed and the legend yet grows; You'll know, you'll know the Dragonborn comes.
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】黑暗消逝，传奇之曲正在编织。你会发现，你会发现，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: You'll know, you'll know the Dragonborn comes.
String.Dest: 终将明白，终会深知，龙裔已至。

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: The rivers rush over Whiterun, as the sun rides in the sky, elks graze on the grassland, as a hawk passes by.
String.Dest: 河水流过雪满城，太阳高照，麋鹿悠闲的吃草，老鹰从空中飞过.

String.Source: The forest in the Rift, where the trees are spun of gold, and Handsome Man's Grotto, what wonders can it hold?
String.Dest: The forest in the Rift, where the trees are spun of gold, and Handsome Man's Grotto, what wonders can it hold?

String.Source: Skyrim's home to many beautiful things! A butterfly in sunbeams, with jewels on its wings.
String.Dest: 天际是很多美丽事物的故乡！她是日光下飞舞的蝴蝶，翅膀上还有璀璨的宝石加以点缀。

String.Source: The cresting of the waves 'neath the ships at sea, and in the Eldergleam there grows a twining Tree.
String.Dest: 波浪在船下涌起, 在Eldergleam 长着一颗环抱树.

String.Source: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.
String.Dest: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.

String.Source: Let nature now surround you, let it fill up your heart! We're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: 让大自然包围你，让它充斥着你的心！我们的肉体是迪贝拉创造的，我们是她的艺术品。

String.Source: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Dest: The forest in the Rift, where the trees are spun of gold, and Handsome Man's Grotto, what wonders can it hold?

String.Dest: 波浪在船下涌起, 在Eldergleam 长着一颗环抱树.

String.Source: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.
String.Dest: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.

String.Source: Let nature now surround you, let it fill up your heart! We're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: 让大自然包围你，让它充斥着你的心！我们的肉体是迪贝拉创造的，我们是她的艺术品。

String.Source: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.

String.Dest: {完成}
