String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: {Intro}
String.Dest: {介绍}

String.Source: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart! I tell you, I tell you, the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 【原版歌词替换】英雄，英雄，勇者无惧。我告诉你，我告诉你，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: With a Voice wielding power of the ancient Nord art; Believe, believe the Dragornborn comes;
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】诺德技艺，龙吼回归。没错，没错，他是龙裔。

String.Source: It's an end to the evil, of all Skyrim's foes; Beware, beware the Dragonborn comes;
String.Dest: 终结邪恶，敌人的末日。当心，当心，龙裔出世。

String.Source: For the darkness has passed and the legend yet grows; You'll know, you'll know the Dragonborn comes.
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】黑暗消逝，传奇之曲正在编织。你会发现，你会发现，龙裔已降临。

String.Source: You'll know, you'll know the Dragonborn comes.
String.Dest: 终将明白，终会深知，龙裔已至。

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: You're free to continue following me, but right now I need your blessing.
String.Dest: 你可以继续随意跟着我，但现在我需要你的祝福。

String.Source: Okay! I accept on both counts! Just say the word and I'm right behind you!
String.Dest: 好吧！我接受这两点！只要你一句话，我就跟在你身后！

String.Source: You're always welcome to follow, but right now what I need is your blessing.
String.Dest: 永远欢迎你的陪伴，但现在，我需要的是你的祝福。

String.Source: Okay! I accept on both counts! Just say the word and I'm right behind you!
String.Dest: 好吧！我接受这两点！只要你一句话，我就跟在你身后！

String.Source: You're always welcome to follow, but right now what I need is your blessing.
String.Dest: 永远欢迎你的陪伴，但现在，我需要的是你的祝福。

String.Source: It is? I mean, I've always suspected as much but to hear you say it...are you...are we...oh my, what will I tell everyone back home!
String.Dest: 真的？我是说，我总是抱有怀疑，但如果这是你说的……你……我们是不是……哦天呐，我该怎么让大家乖乖回家去呢！

String.Source: Your beauty is as natural as the Eldergleam, my lady.
String.Dest: 我的女士，你那自然的美貌堪比祖灵。

String.Source: What? That can't be. My mother told me I was beautiful! Are you calling her a liar? How rude.
String.Dest: 什么？怎么可能。我母亲口中的我可是很漂亮的啊！你是想说她在撒谎吗？真没礼貌。

String.Source: The others are hideous. Just like you.
String.Dest: 其他人很丑陋，就跟你一样。

String.Source: Wait, is this some kind of tournament? Why haven't I heard about it? Why hasn't anyone told me!
String.Dest: 等等，这是某种比赛吗？完全没听说过啊，为什么没人告诉我！

String.Source: Oh, you better look your best. There will throngs of spectators.
String.Dest: 哦，你最好全力以赴，外面有成群的观众。

String.Source: I'm a soldier of Dibella! Everything is about beauty! What will they say if I'm uglier than Mara?
String.Dest: 我是迪贝拉的战士！万物之美！如果我比玛拉还难看，人们会怎么想？

String.Source: It's not a contest of beauty.
String.Dest: 这不是关于美的较量。

String.Source: That sounds...vital. And Dibella has chosen me to be her champion? What an honor!
String.Dest: 那听起来…很重要。迪贝拉选择我做她的守护者？这是何等的荣耀。

String.Source: Would you speak for Dibella in a trial of the Nine Divines?
String.Dest: 在九圣灵面前，你还会为迪贝拉辩护吗？

String.Source: I'll need to get my hair done, and my armor polished. I need to look my best.
String.Dest: 我需要修剪一下我的头发，打磨一下我的铠甲。我要把我最好的一面展现出来。

String.Source: Would you speak for Dibella in a trial of the Nine Divines?
String.Dest: 在九圣灵面前，你还会为迪贝拉辩护吗？

String.Source: Oh Gods, what if my best isn't good enough? What if there's someone else prettier? What do the others look like?
String.Dest: 哦天哪，如果我最好的样子还不够好呢？如果某些人更漂亮呢？其他人都长什么样儿？

String.Source: Would you speak for Dibella in a trial of the Nine Divines?
String.Dest: 在九圣灵面前，你还会为迪贝拉辩护吗？

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: Is that it? Are we at the end of the cave? Wait, what's that hole! Oh...that's a long drop. You know, we could just admire the view from up here.
String.Dest: Is that it? Are we at the end of the cave? Wait, what's that hole! Oh...that's a long drop. You know, we could just admire the view from up here.

String.Source: Look at how fast the water rushes east! The salmon back near Whiterun must be as strong as Giants to swim upstream!
String.Dest: 看看奔流向东的水多快啊！从下游返回雪漫的大马哈鱼一定要像巨人一样强壮才能逆流而上！

String.Source: I hear when ships pass through this channel, everyone runs to the top deck to check out the view.
String.Dest: 我听说当船通过这条海峡时，人人都跑上甲板看风景。

String.Source: Look how high this wall is! Look at all the steps! But don't worry, just imagine there's a Greybeard waiting at the top, and we'll be just fine!
String.Dest: 看这面墙多高啊！看那些数不清的台阶！不过别担心，想想灰胡子们在上面等着，心里就有底啦。

String.Source: These two towers are impressive, but the valley carved between them is awe-inspiring.
String.Dest: 这两座塔令人印象如此深刻，但更令人敬畏的则是那雕刻在山谷之间（之物）。

String.Source: Yes! Another puzzle solved! Thinking helms off, slaying gear on!
String.Dest: 很好! 又一个问题解决了!干掉头盔，摧毁齿轮！

String.Source: Those axes look sharp. Dibella made me soft and squishy.
String.Dest: Those axes look sharp. Dibella made me soft and squishy.

String.Source: Oh look at the little islands! They all have candles on them. It really goes well with the water. Nothing bad could come out of this.
String.Dest: 喔～瞧那些小岛！上面还有蜡烛呢。它们在水面呆得真稳当。这里总不会出什么坏事。

String.Source: Shor's Bones, did he say magic spiders? I wonder if they studied at the College?
String.Dest: 舒尔之骨，他说了魔法蜘蛛了么？他们有没有在学院里学过啊？

String.Source: Ma always said you can tell a lot about a man by the tidiness of his room. And that bed is all kinds of crooked.
String.Dest: 妈妈经常说你可以从一个男人的床看出他的为人，而那张床乱的一塌糊涂。

String.Source: Bleh. Dirty dishes and no place to wash them. No wonder they're all piled up. Wizards never take into account the little things.
String.Dest: 啧。那么多脏碟子却没有地方洗它们。难怪难怪它们能堆这么高。看起来巫师们从不关心小事。

String.Source: Look at that light! Even in the darkest, dirtiest caves, the light of Dibella burns away the evil.
String.Dest: 快看那道光！ 即使在最黑暗，最肮脏的洞穴里，迪贝拉（掌管爱和美的女神）的光芒会驱散恶魔。

String.Source: By the Divines...that smell...and this mist. I hope this temple is small. I don't think I can hold my breath for that long.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上……这味道……还有这雾。我希望这神殿能小点儿。我不认为自己可以长时间屏住呼吸。

String.Source: By Dibella's grace, that light doesn't look natural. But neither does anything else in this ruin.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉的恩泽啊，那光看起来不太自然。但在这种遗迹里，这也不叫事儿。

String.Source: This room looks important. Which means it's time to grit our teeth, and teach this mage to respect the dead!
String.Dest: 这屋子看起来挺重要的。这也意味着我们该咬紧牙关，到了教会那帮法师尊重死者的道理的时候了！

String.Source: Wow, that magic...it's beautiful! Of course, it's also a horrifying, unnatural abomination that must be purged from this cave. But it is pretty.
String.Dest: 噢，那魔法...实在太赏心悦目了！当然，那也同样让人感到恐惧。令人厌恶的非自然存在必须得从这个山洞里清除掉。但那东西看起来挺漂亮的。

String.Source: They say when walking narrow bridges like this not to look down. I reject that claim! Look down, look up, look everywhere! Don't miss any of it!
String.Dest: 他们说当你通过一架窄桥时不要往下看。我认为这种说法不对！向下看，向上看，到处看！不要错过任何事情！

String.Source: Wow, I bet all the world's orichalcum is in this mine. There's more of it than there is rock!
String.Dest: 哇哦，我敢说世界上所有的黑铜都在这座矿里。它们比这儿的石头还多！

String.Source: I've seen traps like these. Flames come shooting out from all directions. Well, I say we charge ahead and dance our way through!
String.Dest: 我见过这样的陷阱。火焰会从四面八方喷射而来。呃，我说我们得往前冲然后蹦跶着通过它！

String.Source: Put on your jester pants, heroes! Let's hop, skip, and tumble our way forward!
String.Dest: 穿上你的小丑的裤子，英雄！让我们跳跃着，蹦跶着，翻滚前进吧！

String.Source: These barrels are mostly empty. Which means these bandits haven't done a raid in months.
String.Dest: 这些桶大都空着。说明这些强盗已经好几个月没有干上一票了。

String.Source: Being lazy is never a good thing, although I guess if you're a criminal, it kind of is.
String.Dest: Being lazy is never a good thing, although I guess if you're a criminal, it kind of is.

String.Source: So if that lever triggers the trap, that means the Dwarves built this arena to watch people die?
String.Dest: So if that lever triggers the trap, that means the Dwarves built this arena to watch people die?

String.Source: This is what happens when you cut yourself off from the outside world. You turn mad as mudcrabs.
String.Dest: This is what happens when you cut yourself off from the outside world. You turn mad as mudcrabs.

String.Source: Is that it? Are we at the end of the cave? Wait, what's that hole! Oh...that's a long drop. You know, we could just admire the view from up here.
String.Dest: Is that it? Are we at the end of the cave? Wait, what's that hole! Oh...that's a long drop. You know, we could just admire the view from up here.

String.Source: Yes! Let's go! Beauty waits for no one!
String.Dest: 好耶！咱们上！白富美可不等矮丑挫啊！

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: I need to trade some items with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交易些东西。

String.Source: All right. What do you need? It doesn't matter! You can have it all!
String.Dest: 好吧。你需要什么?没关系!你可以拥有一切!

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I would like to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想和你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Certainly. I'll take any necklaces if you have them. A soldier of Dibella must always look her best.
String.Dest: Certainly. I'll take any necklaces if you have them. A soldier of Dibella must always look her best.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I would like to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想和你交易一些东西。

String.Source: What do you need to take?
String.Dest: 你想要什么东西？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I would like to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想和你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Trading things is always fun.
String.Dest: 好吧。交换东西是挺有趣儿的。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I want to trade some things.
String.Dest: 我想卖点东西。

String.Source: Of course! But perhaps someone as kind as yourself will keep my load light?
String.Dest: 没问题！但是，有没有一个像你这样的大好人能让我少背点东西呢？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Alright. But if you see something remarkable, don't be afraid to shout.
String.Dest: 好吧。但是如果你看到一些不寻常的， 可别害怕得大喊大叫啊。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Awaiting your orders!
String.Dest: 就等你的命令！

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Yes, onward! Only in separate directions! I guess what I'm saying is, safe travels friend!
String.Dest: 对，向前！坚定的朝前走！我是说，一路平安，朋友！

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: On second thought, I don't need anything.
String.Dest: 仔细考虑了一下，我不需要任何东西。

String.Source: Understood!
String.Dest: 明白!

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Can't be done!
String.Dest: 恕难从命!

String.Source: I would if I could!
String.Dest: 如果我能的话一定！

String.Source: Right away!
String.Dest: 马上！

String.Source: Awaiting your instruction!
String.Dest: 你指哪，我打哪！

String.Source: Wow, I've heard of suffering for your art, but never suffering for a horrible Daedra who wants to fill you with disgusting green slime. No thanks.
String.Dest: Wow, I've heard of suffering for your art, but never suffering for a horrible Daedra who wants to fill you with disgusting green slime. No thanks.

String.Source: I hope that incense you inhaled isn't contagious. Just let me know if I start turning green.
String.Dest: I hope that incense you inhaled isn't contagious. Just let me know if I start turning green.

String.Source: With the Red Eagle dead, the Reach is safe! Well, except for the fact that it's still crawling with Forsworn, but still, progress!
String.Dest: With the Red Eagle dead, the Reach is safe! Well, except for the fact that it's still crawling with Forsworn, but still, progress!

String.Source: Stendarr's Mercy...it's almost like the vines are taking over the city. Something about this definitely isn't natural.
String.Dest: Stendarr's Mercy...it's almost like the vines are taking over the city. Something about this definitely isn't natural.

String.Source: These hagraven altars give me the creeps. We aren't staying here long, are we?
String.Dest: These hagraven altars give me the creeps. We aren't staying here long, are we?

String.Source: I don't like these glowing pods. There's something unnatural about them. And call me crazy, but I think I saw one of those vines back there twitch.
String.Dest: I don't like these glowing pods. There's something unnatural about them. And call me crazy, but I think I saw one of those vines back there twitch.

String.Source: It sounds like these Forsworn are trying to resurrect the Red Eagle! My uncle Hestus told me stories about him. He wasn't very nice.
String.Dest: It sounds like these Forsworn are trying to resurrect the Red Eagle! My uncle Hestus told me stories about him. He wasn't very nice.

String.Source: Oh, a fishing boat! These bandits must've really liked salmon.
String.Dest: 哦，一艘渔船！那些强盗看起来是真心喜欢鲑鱼。

String.Source: What a beautiful cave. I don't blame this Gathrik for burying himself here, even if doing so defiles it.
String.Dest: 好一个美丽的洞穴啊。真不怪加斯瑞克要把自己埋在这儿，就算那会玷污这儿的美景。

String.Source: It's a shame Fjola had to die. Christer too. Well, I guess one was a bandit and the other was crazy, so mostly the shame's on them.
String.Dest: 这简直是一个耻辱，菲欧拉必须死。克里斯特也得死。好吧，我猜其中一个是土匪另外一个是疯子，他们有多大的耻辱啊。

String.Source: Fjola shouldn't give up on the marriage. Maybe Christer can become a bandit too! They could even kidnap a priest of Mara and renew their vows!
String.Dest: 费尤拉不应该放弃她的婚姻。也许克里斯特也能够成为一个强盗。他们甚至可以绑架玛拉的祭司更改他们的誓言！

String.Source: Dibella...covered in blood. We...we have to wash her! Grab some buckets! Fill them with love! And soap!
String.Dest: Dibella...covered in blood. We...we have to wash her! Grab some buckets! Fill them with love! And soap!

String.Source: I'm glad you rescued Fjotra. A new Sybil is going to do good things for the Temple of Dibella. Those priestesses have lost their way.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你救出了Fjotra。一个新的预言者会给迪贝拉神殿带来转机。那些女祭司已经迷失了方向。

String.Source: This poor man reminds me of my cousin Or. His wife was also kidnapped by bandits. But he was married to his gold, so it's not as tragic as it sounds.
String.Dest: 这可怜的家伙让我想起了我的堂兄 Or. 他的老婆也被强盗绑架了。不过他是跟他的金子结婚的，所以也许没有听上去的那么严重。

String.Source: These adventurers may have died, but chin up! They're not here, they're up there! Yes, that's a roof. But it looks just like the heavens!
String.Dest: 这些冒险者可能已经死了, 但是加油，不要泄气! 他们并不在这里, 他们在那里! 对，那只是一个屋顶. 但它看起来就像天堂!

String.Source: This shrine smells foul. I'll just be standing over here, holding my nose.
String.Dest: 这圣坛的气味太差。我还是站在这边，捂住鼻子等着算了。

String.Source: Oh wow, a pirate ship! I heard they all have eyepatches and parrots and sideburns that go on forever! At least, that's what my uncle Vald told me.
String.Dest: 哇哦，是海盗船！我听说过他们的所有故事！眼罩，鹦鹉和胡子，还有永远不放弃的信念！至少，我叔叔瓦尔德是这么告诉我的。

String.Source: Dibella protect us! What kind of person would do this? I guess it wouldn't be a person at all! More like a Daedra. Let's look for clues.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉保佑我们！什么样的人会干这种事儿？我觉得这根本不是人！更像是个魔人。找找线索。

String.Source: This view seems to be obstructed by Giants. I don't suppose asking them to leave will help either. Giants are pretty rude.
String.Dest: 本来风景挺美的，可惜被巨人乱入了。我想也不可能求他们帮个忙或干脆命令他们离开什么的。巨人可是非常粗鲁的。

String.Source: Two beds, a warm fire, and a view of Solitude. This place is almost perfect, except for all the bandits.
String.Dest: 这里有两张床，一个温暖的火炉，还有孤独城美景。这地方简直完美，除了这一大堆盗贼之外。

String.Source: That was pretty rude of the bandit to attack us after we saved him. Rude and stupid.
String.Dest: 这强盗在我们救了他之后还袭击我们真是太粗鲁了。又粗鲁有愚蠢。

String.Source: So the map says this place is called Widow's Watch? It's a shame the tower fell over. Now nobody can watch anything.
String.Dest: 地图上说这地方叫 Widow's Watch? 可惜啊这塔已经倒了。谁也没法在这儿了望谁了。

String.Source: If I were ran this town, I'd sell the mines first chance I got. At least the Silver-Bloods are offering money. The Forsworn offer blood.
String.Dest: 如果当初是我在经营这个小镇，那我肯定在第一时间就把矿井给卖了。至少银血家族的人在提供赏金。而弃誓者们则要放点血了。

String.Source: Poor Melka! I can't believe someone would do this to her! Of course, she's a hideous deformity born from evil, so she deserves everything she gets.
String.Dest: 可怜的梅尔卡！我简直无法相信居然有人会那样对待她！当然，既然她就是个恶魔所生的丑陋的畸形儿，那她所受的一切也是活该。

String.Source: That Draugr was tough. He kept getting back up. I don't like it when dead things do that.
String.Dest: 那尸鬼真耐操。他不停地站起来。已死之物仍执意徘徊人世，真是令人头痛。

String.Source: Serpent's Bluff used to be an old Nord fort, didn't it? I really don't get why the Jarls abandon these. They should turn them into observatories.
String.Dest: 蛇石断崖曾经是作为一个诺德古要塞而存在着不是吗？我实在无法理解为什么它会被领主们废弃，他们应该用它来做了望塔。

String.Source: The Gildergreen is beautiful but sad. Maybe I'm still mad at you for hurting the Eldergleam, but I feel like I'm looking at a caged animal.
String.Dest: 翠苒树很美，但令人伤感。也许因为你伤害了古藤，我仍然有些生气，但我觉得自己就好像在看着一头笼中困兽一样。

String.Source: Drink a resist cuteness potion! Hold hands with your loved one! Behold the Gildergreen sapling! Nature's newest baby!
String.Dest: 来试试看这瓶伶俐抵抗药水啦！喝了它你就能与你的恋人牵手啦！看看那翠苒树的小树苗！那可是神奇的自然的最新产物啊！

String.Source: Is that Nettlebane? The blade looks like its been stained green. It must have killed a lot trees. Amalee does not approve!
String.Dest: 那就是草木灾星？它看起来都被绿色浸透了。不知杀死过多少树木了啊，艾米莉不答应！！

String.Source: So this Saadia is the one the Alik'r are looking for? What will you do? Who do you trust? Don't look at me, I trust everyone.
String.Dest: 所以说那帮阿利克尔战士所找的那个人并不是萨蒂娅？你打算怎么做呢？要相信哪一边呢？哦别看着我，我从不怀疑任何人。

String.Source: These Falmer should know better. I know what's it like to have a unruly roommate, but enslaving them is uncalled for.
String.Dest: 这些雪精灵应该更清楚。我知道和一个凶横的人同住的感觉，但是奴役他们完全没道理。

String.Source: My mother told me stories of the Wolf Queen. She was a bad person. And these necromancers were trying to summon her? Shame on them!
String.Dest: 我母亲给我讲过狼女王的故事。她坏透了。这帮亡灵法师在尝试召唤她？真不知廉耻！

String.Source: Shipwrecks like the Orphan's Tear are really said. But they are appropriately named.
String.Dest: 沉船像孤儿之泪一说倒是真的。但它们的称呼的确挺形象的。

String.Source: This trouble at Wolfskull Cave sounds like a job for a seasoned adventurer. Which is exactly what we are! Onward! Let no wolf or skull go unexamined!
String.Dest: 这个在恶狼头骨洞穴的麻烦听起来像是需要一个经验丰富的冒险者去解决. 这正是我们来这里的原因! 前进! 无论恶狼还是头骨，一个也不要留!

String.Source: Meridia's beacon is a very beautiful gem. It almost makes you forget that it's just another kind of rock.
String.Dest: 美瑞蒂亚的灯塔是个绝美至极的宝石。它几乎会让你忘了它其实只是另一种石头。

String.Source: That Rueful Axe looks evil. Probably because it belongs to a Daedric Lord. But also because axes are almost as ugly as maces.
String.Dest: 这把哀伤之斧看起来挺邪恶。也许因为它属于一个魔族领主。但也是因为这把斧子几乎和把锤子那么丑了。

String.Source: So is that mask supposed to be a reward? It's hideous.
String.Dest: 就拿这么个面具当奖赏？丑爆了。

String.Source: This Wood Elf should have left nature well alone. Bears don't like it when you move your stuff into their home. Heck, people don't like it either.
String.Dest: 这个木精灵不应该去干涉自然的事情。熊不喜欢你把杂七杂八的玩意儿放进它的地盘，见鬼！人也是一样。

String.Source: I really like these glowing mushrooms. I wonder if they come in smaller sizes. I want to take one home and use it as a torch.
String.Dest: 我真的很喜欢这些发光的蘑菇。我想如果它们能更小一号的话，我就想摘一个回家把它当火把用了。

String.Source: Why are these people serving the Falmer? We need to cure them of their afflictions! Gather the apothecaries! Pull the nirnroot! It's time to heal!
String.Dest: 为什么这些人要为领主服务？我们要解除他们的烦恼！聚集药剂师们！加入奈恩之根！是时候治愈他们了！

String.Source: This is a nice little laboratory. It's really clean too, well, except for the cobwebs. I wonder if tiny Dwemer spiders made them.
String.Dest: 这是个如此精巧的实验室。真的很干净，呃，除了那些蜘蛛网。我不知道蛛网是不是那些超小型的锻莫蜘蛛结的。

String.Source: Who was that Khajiit talking to? All I see is a dead person.
String.Dest: 那个虎人在跟谁说话呢？那里只有一个死人啊。

String.Source: This Septimus reminds me of my Uncle Dengar. Ma says he chewed on one too many blisterworts.
String.Dest: 这个赛普汀默示让我想起了我的丹戈尔叔叔。妈妈总说他气泡草吃多了。

String.Source: This stonework is massive. But you know what's even more massive? The sky! When will mortals learn, all these towers and things just gets in the way!
String.Dest: 这个石雕非常巨大。但你知道什么是更巨大的吗？天空！什么时候凡人们才会明白，所有这些塔和高大的东西就只是挡道而已！

String.Source: I don't know about the temple, but this is a beautiful ravine. The Forsworn should be ashamed of themselves for not sharing it.
String.Dest: 我不知道关于神殿的事情，不过这峡谷可真美啊。居然不愿把这么好的地方与大家共享，那帮弃誓者们不会问心有愧么。

String.Source: Alduin's Wall just looks like a bunch of shadows and swirls. We must color the flames red! The swords silver! Re-sculpt the hero to match your face!
String.Dest: 奥杜因之墙看起来只是一大堆阴影和漩涡什么的。我们应该把火焰涂成红色！把刀剑漆上银漆！把英雄的脸修改成你的模样！

String.Source: Are those two fighting? This place is scary.
String.Dest: 那两个人是在打架吗？这地方太可怕了！

String.Source: I could've told you Arngeir wasn't the leader. The wisest monk always climbs to the top of the mountain. It's the best way to enjoy the view!
String.Dest: 我可以告诉你艾恩盖尔不是领导者。最聪明的修道士总是爬到山顶。这是欣赏风景的绝佳方式！

String.Source: Fear not, citizens of Winterhold! Your town can be rebuilt! Better, stronger! Think of this as an opportunity!
String.Dest: Fear not, citizens of Winterhold! Your town can be rebuilt! Better, stronger! Think of this as an opportunity!

String.Source: I think I'm done shouting for today. I could use a drink. Does this place serve milk? Oh, I mean, um, order me your biggest mead cup.
String.Dest: 我想我做了，一天到晚大喊大叫，我应该喝点什么。这里提供牛奶吗？ 哦，我的意思是，呃，给我端上你这儿最大号的蜂蜜酒酒杯来。

String.Source: An inn. Rest for the weary adventurer, and tired eyes. Come morning, they will be wide open once more.
String.Dest: 客栈，让疲惫的冒险家休息，得以合上他们困顿的眼睛。清晨到来时，冒险家们将再次睁开双眼。

String.Source: I've never actually seen a "winking skeever." Well, I'm sure when I do, it'll be magnificent!
String.Dest: 我从没有真正见过一只“眨眼雪鼠”。当然喽，我敢说如果真能见到一只那一定棒极了。

String.Source: The Silver-Blood inn. If our blood was really silver, after a battle we could make pendants out of our wounds. Wouldn't that be great?
String.Dest: 银血旅店。如果我们的血真的是银子做的，那每当我们干完架，就能用伤口流出的血做成银饰了，挺不错的不是吗？

String.Source: These poor priestesses. Don't they realize Dibella does not heed the call of those who only seek lust? Her beauty is not so shallow.
String.Dest: 这些可怜的女祭司。难道她们没意识到迪贝拉没有回应那些只为寻求肉欲的呼唤吗？她的美可没这么肤浅。

String.Source: It's good to be home. Markarth may look dangerous, and well...that's because it is. Always trust your eyes, and not your gut.
String.Dest: 还是回家好哇。马卡斯城看起来危险，呃好吧……它本来就很危险。总是相信自己的眼睛，而不是你的直觉。

String.Source: The Reach is home to rocky vistas, rolling hills, and cascading waterfalls. Keep your eyes open, traveler, we shan't miss a thing!
String.Dest: The Reach is home to rocky vistas, rolling hills, and cascading waterfalls. Keep your eyes open, traveler, we shan't miss a thing!

String.Source: Bandits must be reformed. How can we bring nature to the people if they keep defiling it? We must let them know of their folly!
String.Dest: 土匪必须被再造。如果他们继续亵渎它，我们如何才能把自然带到人们身边呢？我们必须让他们知道他们有多么愚蠢！

String.Source: Bandits everywhere, awaken from your slumber! Be not a vandal of nature, but a witness! A crier! Show the people nature's beauty and yours!
String.Dest: 强盗随处可见，从你的迷梦中醒来吧！不要做自然地破坏者，只做它的目击者！它的宣扬者！让人们欣赏你和自然之美吧！

String.Source: I sometimes craft maps, and give them to the stores. That way people know where to find all of Dibella's wonders.
String.Dest: 我有些时候也制作地图，然后赋予它们以一个个故事。这样人们就能知道该上哪去找每一处迪贝拉神迹了。

String.Source: I wonder if the steward here has gotten my letters. I must have sent out hundreds.
String.Dest: 我不知道这里的管家是否收到了我的来信。我必须再寄他个几百封。

String.Source: Are you hungry? I'm hungry. What should we eat? Where should we eat? I guess I'll let you figure out the tough decisions.
String.Dest: 你饿了吗？我饿了。我们要吃什么？我们要在哪里吃？我猜我会让你解决这个困难的决议。

String.Source: I think when I retire from adventuring, I'll come live in the Rift. The Fall Forest is like raining art.
String.Dest: 我想当我不再冒险的时候，我会住在裂痕领。秋林的落叶似雨一般的让人着迷。

String.Source: High Hrothgar. Ivarstead. They call it the Throat of the World, but it's really the easel for a canvas of sky.
String.Dest: 高吼峰。紫衫镇。人们都把它叫作世界之喉，但它其实是天空这张巨大画板的支架。

String.Source: Windhelm needs more cheer. Grab an Argonian by the horns! An Elf by the ears! Point to the heavens and tell them, chin up! It gets better with time!
String.Dest: 风盔城需要更多的欢呼。看着亚龙人的角！精灵的耳朵！指向天堂然后告诉他们，亮出来！以后会越来越好的！

String.Source: This city is too gray. Ask the women for their makeup, have the artists donate their palettes! We will wash the stones with colors of happiness!
String.Dest: 这座城市太灰暗了。跟女士索要她们的化妆品，让艺术家捐出他们的调色板！我们会给每一块儿石头都涂上幸福的颜色！

String.Source: Riften is beautiful, but sometimes it seems, I don't know, unstable? The wood, I mean. I'm used to Dwarven stone.
String.Dest: 裂谷城很美，但有些时候觉着吧，我也不知道该怎么说，大概有点不够坚固？我是说，那些木质建筑。我已经习惯了矮人的那些石质建筑了。

String.Source: I forgot Riften has an orphanage! Also, beggars. I may have to rethink my system. Or does the temple money go to them anyway? Hmm...
String.Dest: 我忘了裂谷城有个孤儿院！额，还有乞丐。我可能要好好重新设想我的计划。是不是神庙的钱无论如何都会到他们手里呢？呃。。。

String.Source: The buildings in Solitude are, erm, nice, but they seem a bit unnatural. They don't blend into the mountain as well as Markarth.
String.Dest: 孤独城里的建筑都，呃，很棒，但是看起来有一点不自然。它们不像马卡斯城的建筑物一样会融入周围的山里。

String.Source: I wonder if they have harps at the Bards College. Harps are the best.
String.Dest: 我在想吟游诗人学院他们是不是有竖琴呢。竖琴是最棒的了。

String.Source: The people in this city are very beautiful. It must be very hard for newcomers to get attention. N-not that I'm afraid of a little competition.
String.Dest: 这个城市的人们都太漂亮了，外来者在这儿很难引起人们的注意。我可不是害怕来一场小竞赛喔。

String.Source: Whiterun is a good example of classic Nord architecture. We still have a long way to go though before measuring up to nature.
String.Dest: 白漫城的建筑是很典型的诺德风格。在测出它的本质之前，我们还有许多困难要克服。

String.Source: Falkreath. Home of dead things. But cemeteries can be pretty too. My headstone is going to be made of marble, and jewels, and orichalcum!
String.Dest: Falkreath. Home of dead things. But cemeteries can be pretty too. My headstone is going to be made of marble, and jewels, and orichalcum!

String.Source: I heard Morthal was run by a fortune teller, but that was a while back. I guess it could be the same person.
String.Dest: 我听说墨索尔城是由一个算命先生管理的，不过那是一段时间之前的事了。我估计现在还是同一个人。

String.Source: We should go north. I bet there's all sorts of colorful things to see in the marsh. Like bugs and weird plants and green water!
String.Dest: 我们应该往北走。我敢打赌，这里有一堆跟沼泽一个颜色的东西。像是虫子啊

String.Source: A lot of hunters live in this hold. It's like exploring caves, only outdoors. You really have to get high up though to enjoy the view.
String.Dest: 一些猎人住在这个洞里。就像是勘探山洞，野外那种。你真的该爬高点看看。

String.Source: I don't think Haelga has a very good understanding of what Dibella is about. Clearly she hasn't read any of the letters I've been passing around.
String.Dest: 我不认为哈尔嘉能很好的理解迪贝拉是什么。显然她还没有读过我寄过去的信件。

String.Source: My parents fought for the Empire. Although so did the Stormcloaks. Wars are confusing.
String.Dest: 我的父母为了帝国而战，而风暴斗篷们也一样。战争这东西真是令人费解。

String.Source: Your house is perfect. No, better than perfect. It's almost divine.
String.Dest: 你这房子可真完美。不，比完美还要美。简直是神圣！

String.Source: If I owned a house like this, it would be hard for me to leave. But leave I must, for adventure's sake.
String.Dest: 要是我有这样的房子，恐怕就很难想要离开了。可我必须离开，因为我是个冒险者。

String.Source: I once had a nightmare. I think. I woke up, looked in the mirror, and my nose was crooked. Does that count?
String.Dest: 我想我曾经有过一场噩梦：“我醒来，看着镜中的自己，发现我的鼻子歪了。”这算吗？

String.Source: Dawnstar. The sunrise here must be amazing. Wait, is the shore facing north? I don't get it.
String.Dest: 晨星城。那里的日出一定很美。等等，是在临北的海岸吗？我不明白。

String.Source: We must save these Orc Strongholds. Grab the chief by the shoulders! Shake him mightily! Tell him beauty is out there, waiting to be seen!
String.Dest: 我们必须拯救这些兽人要塞。抓住酋长的肩膀！把他摇来晃去！告诉他美人儿就在那边，等着被看呢！

String.Source: Orcs of Skyrim! Do not limit yourself! Mine for natural wonders! Forge indelible art! Show the people you are not who they say!
String.Dest: 天际省的兽人们！不要限制自己！为自然奇观而开矿！为不可磨灭的艺术而锻造！向人们展示你不是他们所说的那种人！

String.Source: It's a crime the way these mines are decorated. As in, they aren't decorated at all! Call the foreman! File a complaint! Something must be done!
String.Dest: 这样的方法是犯罪！这些矿井都被【装饰】了。却跟他们完全没被装饰一个样！叫工头来！我要投诉！必须做点儿什么！

String.Source: A Spriggan grove. Sometimes nature isn't all that friendly.
String.Dest: 一个树精的森林。有时候大自然也表现得不那么友好。

String.Source: We must show these warlocks the error of their ways. We must make them peacelocks, agents of good. I'm just not sure how.
String.Dest: 我们必须给这些巫师们指出他们的错误所在。我们得让他们更加“爱好和平“一点儿，让他们乐善好施。我只是不清楚该怎么做。

String.Source: A shipwreck. The ocean is kind of like walking on a rickety bridge. Only when you look in the water, you can't really see how far the fall is.
String.Dest: 一艘破船。航海就像走在不结实的木桥上。Only when you look in the water, you can't really see how far the fall is.

String.Source: Did you make a donation? Did you pray at the shrine? Form a line at the altar, and let us do it once more!
String.Dest: 你给香油钱了吗? 你在神殿那祷告了吗? 在祭坛前排成一行, 然后让我们再来一遍!

String.Source: A temple! What perfect timing! Time to free myself of this pesky gold.
String.Dest: 一座神殿！多完美的时机啊！是时候把我从这惹人烦的金子手中解放出来了。

String.Source: I believe that in the heart of every brigand lies a soldier of Dibella. All it takes is 1 sight, 1 landmark, and they will turn.
String.Dest: 我相信每个强盗都有着一颗成为迪贝拉的士兵的心。只要一个眼神，一个地标，他们就会完成转变。

String.Source: Some think Dwarves were like their buildings, hard and chiseled. I like to imagine they were squishy, with breath that smelled like juniper berries.
String.Dest: 一些人认为矮人就像他们的建筑物一样，坚硬而棱角分明。我却觉得他们粘糊糊的，闻起来就像是杜松子。

String.Source: What's today, Sundas? We should pray at the shrine of Dibella. I'm feeling a little unclean.
String.Dest: What's today, Sundas? We should pray at the shrine of Dibella. I'm feeling a little unclean.

String.Source: I wonder if the current owners will let me into my old house. Would that be intruding? People say I do that a lot, but mostly with personal space.
String.Dest: 我不知道现在的主人让不让我进自己的老房子里。那会有什么困扰吗？人们说我做了很多，但大多数人都需要些私密的空间。

String.Source: Stores are a good place to find all sorts of artful trinkets. It's almost like indoor adventuring.
String.Dest: 商店是发现各种巧妙的小玩意儿的好地方。就跟室内冒险一个样。

String.Source: Some people swear by the beauty of vampires. They're...pale, and kind of mysterious. I guess I can see it...sort of.
String.Dest: 有些人向那些吸血鬼美人发誓效忠。她们……苍白，而神秘。我想，也许我能……偷偷看一眼。

String.Source: The Hag's Cure. Same old cures, same old hag. But its beauty never fades.
String.Dest: 鬼婆药水。和鬼婆一样治愈，和鬼婆一样古老。但是却从未褪去美色。

String.Source: I plan on donating my gold to the temple. That's why it's a good rule to always go there first. Stores like this are far too tempting.
String.Dest: 我打算向神殿捐款。这就是好规则总是先从那里实行的原因。像这样的商店太诱人了。

String.Source: I would never disparage sleeping outside. Every night, Dibella blesses us with a necklace of stars. But warm fires and warm beds are nice too.
String.Dest: 我从不反对露宿。每天晚上迪贝拉的星型项链都在保佑着我们。但是温暖的炉火和被窝也很棒啊。

String.Source: This is why it's never good to own things. You can't lose what you don't have.
String.Dest: 这便是我终究难以守成的缘由了，非己所有,终未有失.

String.Source: If Alduin's Wall was so impressive, why did people forget it? Because it's forgettable!
String.Dest: 如果奥杜因之墙真的能让人这么印象深刻的话，人们为什么会遗忘它？因为那玩意太容易让人忘掉了。

String.Source: A horn thief, and a secret rendezvous at the Sleeping Giant Inn! Put on your sleuthing gloves, Dragonborn, we have a mystery on our hands!
String.Dest: A horn thief, and a secret rendezvous at the Sleeping Giant Inn! Put on your sleuthing gloves, Dragonborn, we have a mystery on our hands!

String.Source: Pinch your nose and furrow your brow! What's the smell? Who knows! We're in a sewer!
String.Dest: 捏起你的鼻子，皱起你的眉头吧！那是什么味道？谁知道啊！我们可是在下水道！

String.Source: There's a Thalmor Embassy in Skyrim? And they hold parties with important people? Why wasn't I told? Now I know where to send my letters.
String.Dest: 这是在天际省的梭默大使馆？他们邀请贵客举行宴会？为什么没人告诉我？现在我知道去哪里送我的信了。

String.Source: 7,000 steps sounds like a lot, but if we take long strides and skip every other step, it's only half that much!
String.Dest: 7000步听起来好像很多，但如果我们大步前行，跳过其中的一些台阶，它只有一半那么多！

String.Source: When I say I want to move people with my shouting, this isn't exactly what I meant. But I'm glad it works for you.
String.Dest: When I say I want to move people with my shouting, this isn't exactly what I meant. But I'm glad it works for you.

String.Source: This place is dangerous! Sure, there were only two of them, but one crazy person is worth ten sane ones.
String.Dest: 这个地方是很危险的！当然，他们只有两个人，但一个疯子的战斗力顶十个正常人的啊。

String.Source: You've joined the Companions! Congratulations! This is me applauding, with my voice!
String.Dest: 你加入了战友团！恭喜！我为你鼓掌欢呼！

String.Source: Why is it called the Potion of the Stallion? I don't get it. Is the steward a horse?
String.Dest: 为什么这药被称为"种马药剂"呢？我不明白啊。难道是给马用的？

String.Source: Where is this light coming from? Where is it going? Questions to be answered, adventurers, and we're the ones to answer them!
String.Dest: 这光是从哪里来的？又要去哪里呢？这些问题需要答案，冒险者，我们就是那些给出回答的人！

String.Source: Follow Skjor inside, brave adventurer, undergo their trial. Keep your chin up high, and I'm sure nothing will go wrong!
String.Dest: 在里面跟着斯科月， 勇敢的冒险者，接受他们的试炼。 抬头挺胸，我保证一切会顺利的！

String.Source: A hunter's rest? What a great idea! We should build an Adventurer's Rest! A sanctuary for all those who crave adventure and have bad knees!
String.Dest: 一个猎人的休息处吗？真是个好主意！我们应该建立一个冒险者的休息处！一个为所有那些渴望冒险但膝盖不好的人们所建立的圣所！

String.Source: As much as I love nature, something about the Sleeping Tree seems...off.
String.Dest: 以我对自然界的了解来看， 沉睡之树的某些机能……停止运作了。

String.Source: Oh...now I get it. At first I thought you were helping those cannibals. But you're really just infiltrating their cult to destroy them! Right?
String.Dest: 哦……现在我明白啦。起初我真还以为你是帮助那些食人族的。但是你其实只是假装崇拜，以此渗透他们，然后再杀死他们！对吧？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Is that all you got?
String.Dest: 你就这点本事？

String.Source: Dibella smite you!
String.Dest: 迪贝拉诅咒你!

String.Source: Agh! That was uncalled for!
String.Dest: 啊! 我们没有叫你这样做!

String.Source: That didn't hurt! Maybe!
String.Dest: 没有受伤！大概吧。

String.Source: No, not the face!
String.Dest: 不！别打脸！

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 噢！够了！一切都完了

String.Source: Is that it? My little niece hits harder than you!
String.Dest: Is that it? My little niece hits harder than you!

String.Source: Blasted spiders!
String.Dest: Blasted spiders!

String.Source: Ah, don't bite me!
String.Dest: Ah, don't bite me!

String.Source: Get away from me you pale freaks!
String.Dest: Get away from me you pale freaks!

String.Source: Get away from me you nasty little bug!
String.Dest: Get away from me you nasty little bug!

String.Source: Errrrrrryyargh!
String.Dest: 咿呀！

String.Source: Eyaargh!
String.Dest: 哎呀！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: How did that feel?
String.Dest: 感觉如何？

String.Source: For the love of Dibella, will you just stand still!
String.Dest: 迪贝拉的伟爱在上，你就不能站着别动么！！

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这无名的蝼蚁之辈！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: You need a shave, werewolf!
String.Dest: 你该剃毛了，狼人！

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你只不过会夸夸其谈而已！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Die, you fiend!
String.Dest: 去死吧，少年。

String.Source: Dibella have mercy on you!
String.Dest: 迪贝拉 爱你！

String.Source: Repent, I say!
String.Dest: 我说了，忏悔！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 想尝尝这招吗？

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你这恶魔！

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要取你的首级！

String.Source: Fall to me, Giant!
String.Dest: Fall to me, Giant!

String.Source: I'll cut you down to size!
String.Dest: I'll cut you down to size!

String.Source: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!
String.Dest: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!

String.Source: You're bleeding oil, machine!
String.Dest: You're bleeding oil, machine!

String.Source: Die, you metal monster!
String.Dest: Die, you metal monster!

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: You'll need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 不给力啊！！

String.Source: Not quite good enough!
String.Dest: 还不够好！

String.Source: Ha, didn't think I could block that, did you?
String.Dest: 哈，没想到我能阻止，是吗？

String.Source: You can't hurt a soldier of Dibella!
String.Dest: You can't hurt a soldier of Dibella!

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: You will yield or you will die!
String.Dest: 投降！或者死！

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有命的时候，投降吧！

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我能连你的鳞片都一刀切了，怪物！

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 投降或着去死吧！

String.Source: To Aetherius with you!
String.Dest: 艾瑟瑞斯与你同在！

String.Source: Damn rebels!
String.Dest: 该死的叛军。

String.Source: You're bleeding oil, machine!
String.Dest: You're bleeding oil, machine!

String.Source: Die you metal monster!
String.Dest: Die you metal monster!

String.Source: They're nimble! Watch yourself!
String.Dest: They're nimble! Watch yourself!

String.Source: I'll skin you alive, wolf!
String.Dest: I'll skin you alive, wolf!

String.Source: Watch for their lunges!
String.Dest: Watch for their lunges!

String.Source: Take that you big hairy beast!
String.Dest: Take that you big hairy beast!

String.Source: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!
String.Dest: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!

String.Source: Watch yourself! Trolls move fast and hit hard!
String.Dest: Watch yourself! Trolls move fast and hit hard!

String.Source: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!
String.Dest: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!

String.Source: I'll turn you into scrap metal!
String.Dest: I'll turn you into scrap metal!

String.Source: Keep your guard up! Watch out for their venom!
String.Dest: Keep your guard up! Watch out for their venom!

String.Source: Face me, Falmer!
String.Dest: Face me, Falmer!

String.Source: Your conjuring days are over, warlock!
String.Dest: Your conjuring days are over, warlock!

String.Source: That's the last of them.
String.Dest: That's the last of them.

String.Source: Phew! That takes care of that.
String.Dest: Phew! That takes care of that.

String.Source: I hope they learned their lesson. Although I guess they won't be learning anything now that they're dead.
String.Dest: I hope they learned their lesson. Although I guess they won't be learning anything now that they're dead.

String.Source: Now that's what I call teamwork!
String.Dest: Now that's what I call teamwork!

String.Source: I think I'm getting the hang of this fighting thing.
String.Dest: I think I'm getting the hang of this fighting thing.

String.Source: And with that, we win the battle! Next stop, the war!
String.Dest: And with that, we win the battle! Next stop, the war!

String.Source: We won! Not dying is always a good thing.
String.Dest: We won! Not dying is always a good thing.

String.Source: Phew! That was a close call.
String.Dest: Phew! That was a close call.

String.Source: That was tiring. Dibella doesn't like it when I'm sweaty.
String.Dest: That was tiring. Dibella doesn't like it when I'm sweaty.

String.Source: That was tiring. Dibella doesn't like it when I'm sweaty.
String.Dest: That was tiring. Dibella doesn't like it when I'm sweaty.

String.Source: That takes care of this group!
String.Dest: That takes care of this group!

String.Source: We get stronger with each fight.
String.Dest: We get stronger with each fight.

String.Source: (Bard) A Warrior's Life. I'll play the drums.
String.Dest: (吟游诗人)一个战士宿命。我会打鼓。

String.Source: It'll be my pleasure.
String.Dest: 这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵术士啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: It's been a long journey. I could use a drink. And maybe a bite to eat.
String.Dest: It's been a long journey. I could use a drink. And maybe a bite to eat.

String.Source: If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has to offer.
String.Dest: If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has to offer.

String.Source: This inn looks promising.
String.Dest: This inn looks promising.

String.Source: All right, let's see what's on the menu.
String.Dest: All right, let's see what's on the menu.

String.Source: Well, I haven't actually done it. But like I said, I'm prepared to learn! It's just another part of nature to explore!
String.Dest: 事实上我还没做完呢。但是就像是我说的，我已经准备好去学习了！这只是探索自然的一部分！

String.Source: It sounds to me like you don't have any experience making love.
String.Dest: 听这意思你还是个处男呢！

String.Source: Although with nature, I like to keep my eyes open. But Aunt Felsi said it's best to close your eyes and think of Elsweyr. It's all so confusing.
String.Dest: 虽然在自然中，我喜欢睁开双眼。不过菲尔希阿姨说最好闭上你的眼睛，然后想想艾斯维尔。这一切都太混乱了。

String.Source: It sounds to me like you don't have any experience making love.
String.Dest: 听这意思你还是个处男呢！

String.Source: I guess there's only way to find out.
String.Dest: 我猜这是唯一能查明的方式了。

String.Source: It sounds to me like you don't have any experience making love.
String.Dest: 听这意思你还是个处男呢！

String.Source: Oh good! Then I don't have to pretend I know what I'm doing! That's a load off my mind! Do you also hate mead? Why are all the adult things horrible?
String.Dest: 哦太好了！那我就不用装作知道自己在做什么了！真叫我松了口气儿！你也讨厌蜜酒吗？为什么大人的东西都这么可怕啊？

String.Source: To be honest, you'll be my first as well.
String.Dest: 说实话，你也是我的第一个

String.Source: Well, hopefully making love isn't. Aunt Felsi said it's best to close your eyes and think of Elsweyr.
String.Dest: 好吧，但愿做爱不是件可怕的事情。菲尔希阿姨说当你闭上眼睛想着艾斯维尔的时候感觉会非常棒的。

String.Source: To be honest, you'll be my first as well.
String.Dest: 说实话，你也是我的第一个

String.Source: Ma says Uncle Rognar is just bad at it, but I don't know. I guess there's only way to find out.
String.Dest: 妈妈说Rognar叔叔只是不擅长那个，但我不懂。我猜发现真相的方法只有一个。

String.Source: To be honest, you'll be my first as well.
String.Dest: 说实话，你也是我的第一个

String.Source: A mudcrab? What in Dibella do you...oh...you mean like the legs are the pincers and...nope, still don't get it.
String.Dest: 泥蟹？迪贝拉在上你……哦……你指喜像腿就是钳子还有……不，我还是不懂。

String.Source: It's actually more like a chaurus and a mudcrab. When it's done right.
String.Dest: 当它做对了的时候，确实更像是查鲁斯和泥沼蟹。

String.Source: This sounds like it might hurt. But cousin Renna says that's good thing. I don't understand. Getting hurt isn't fun. It's horrible.
String.Dest: 这听起来可能会受伤。但我表兄雷纳说这是好事。我不知道。受伤不好玩。真是糟糕透了！

String.Source: It's actually more like a chaurus and a mudcrab. When it's done right.
String.Dest: 当它做对了的时候，确实更像是查鲁斯和泥沼蟹。

String.Source: But maybe she was just teasing me. I guess there's only way to find out.
String.Dest: 但也许她是在戏弄我。我想只有唯一的办法去弄清楚。

String.Source: It's actually more like a chaurus and a mudcrab. When it's done right.
String.Dest: 当它做对了的时候，确实更像是查鲁斯和泥沼蟹。

String.Source: I don't think it will change us at all. We'll still adventure together, we'll just come home to the same bed.
String.Dest: 我不认为这会改变我们之间的关系。我们依然会携手冒险，依然会共枕而眠。

String.Source: How do you think married life will change us?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为婚姻生活会改变我们？

String.Source: Although I guess that part will change a lot. But don't worry, I'm experienced. I know how it all works down there.
String.Dest: 尽管我想床上那部分应该会有挺大变化的，不过别担心，我可是经验丰富。我会让一切都顺顺利利的。

String.Source: How do you think married life will change us?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为婚姻生活会改变我们？

String.Source: Ma told me all about birds and the bees. Or was it the butterfly and the redwort? Well, whatever weird bugs and plants it involves, I'll be ready.
String.Dest: 妈妈告诉过我关于鸟儿和蜜蜂的一切。或者那是蝴蝶和红山花？所以说，不管出现什么奇怪的虫子和植物，我都会准备好的。

String.Source: How do you think married life will change us?
String.Dest: 你为什么认为婚姻生活会改变我们？

String.Source: Of course not! I wouldn't dream of it! This doesn't mean I can't sing about our exploits!
String.Dest: 当然没有！我做梦也想不到 ！这并不意味着我不能歌颂我们的功绩！

String.Source: My advice is to never quit adventuring.
String.Dest: 我的建议是永远不要放弃探险.

String.Source: We'll have songs about our triumphs! Our failures! Our assortment of carefully choreographed outfits!
String.Dest: We'll have songs about our triumphs! Our failures! Our assortment of carefully choreographed outfits!

String.Source: My advice is to never quit adventuring.
String.Dest: 我的建议是永远不要放弃探险.

String.Source: We won't even bother speaking anymore, because we'll have enough songs to sing to each other instead!
String.Dest: 我们甚至不用说话了，因为我们有足够多的歌可以唱给对方听！

String.Source: My advice is to never quit adventuring.
String.Dest: 我的建议是永远不要放弃探险.

String.Source: And it all starts today, thanks to you! Aren't you glad we came?
String.Dest: And it all starts today, thanks to you! Aren't you glad we came?

String.Source: My advice is to never quit adventuring.
String.Dest: 我的建议是永远不要放弃探险.

String.Source: That sounds like something I would say. I think I would really get along with this friend of yours.
String.Dest: 听上去像是我会说的话。我觉得我会和你的这个朋友相处得相当融洽。That sounds like something I would say. I think I would really get along with this friend of yours.

String.Source: Someone once told me if you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all.
String.Dest: 有人曾告诉我，如果你讲不出合适的话，那就什么都别说。

String.Source: Hm..I was thinking of playing the song for Ma and Pa, but if it's as bad as you say, maybe I should give it to my sister's cousin's fiance after all.
String.Dest: 嗯……我本来想给爸爸妈妈唱一首歌。但是如果像你说的那样的，也许我还是把这个工作交给姐姐的未婚夫吧。

String.Source: Someone once told me if you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all.
String.Dest: 有人曾告诉我，如果你讲不出合适的话，那就什么都别说。

String.Source: Either way, they say every long journey begins with a single step. Now that we've got that out of the way, I'm ready to start running!
String.Dest: 总之，人们说千里之行始于足下。我们现在已经确实地理解这一点了，我准备好开始跑了！

String.Source: Someone once told me if you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all.
String.Dest: 有人曾告诉我，如果你讲不出合适的话，那就什么都别说。

String.Source: And now that I'm a songwriter of sorts, if we come across any other songs in our travels, I'll do my best to learn them!
String.Dest: 现在我也算一个作曲家什么的了，要是我们路上听到什么好歌，我就尽量把它学来！

String.Source: Someone once told me if you can't say anything nice, don't say anything at all.
String.Dest: 有人曾告诉我，如果你讲不出合适的话，那就什么都别说。

String.Source: Is that a polite way of saying it's bad? You forget, I wrote the book on being polite.
String.Dest: 这是一种委婉的否定吗？你忘了，我写的就是如何变得委婉。

String.Source: An excellent piece for a novice. You have potential.
String.Dest: 对菜鸟来说已经很不错了，你有潜力。

String.Source: Well, I refuse to believe my own suspicions! The milk glass is half full! Your words were a compliment! So to that I say, thank you!
String.Dest: Well, I refuse to believe my own suspicions! The milk glass is half full! Your words were a compliment! So to that I say, thank you!

String.Source: An excellent piece for a novice. You have potential.
String.Dest: 对菜鸟来说已经很不错了，你有潜力。

String.Source: And now that I'm a songwriter of sorts, if we come across any other songs in our travels, I'll do my best to learn them!
String.Dest: 现在我也算一个作曲家什么的了，要是我们路上听到什么好歌，我就尽量把它学来！

String.Source: An excellent piece for a novice. You have potential.
String.Dest: 对菜鸟来说已经很不错了，你有潜力。

String.Source: Really? In that case, maybe it's too good for my cousin's sister's fiance. What if they broke up? He's not even family yet!
String.Dest: 真的啊？这么说，恐怕这对我表哥的姐姐的未婚夫太好了。要是他们分手了怎么办？他现在连亲戚都算不上呢！

String.Source: It was beautiful. It will make for a fine gift.
String.Dest: 真漂亮啊，肯定能当成很棒的礼物！

String.Source: Actually, I was thinking it would be a nice wedding anniversary gift for Ma and Pa. I mean, I can compose hundreds more songs, maybe even thousands!
String.Dest: 事实上，我在想，这个很适合送给爸爸妈妈作结婚周年纪念礼。我是说，我可以再创作几百首歌，甚至也许几千首！

String.Source: It was beautiful. It will make for a fine gift.
String.Dest: 真漂亮啊，肯定能当成很棒的礼物！

String.Source: But this one will always be special. Thanks for helping me write it.
String.Dest: 但是这一次将永远是特别的。谢谢你帮我写这个。

String.Source: It was beautiful. It will make for a fine gift.
String.Dest: 真漂亮啊，肯定能当成很棒的礼物！

String.Source: And now that I'm a songwriter of sorts, if we come across any other songs in our travels, I'll do my best to learn them!
String.Dest: 现在我也算一个作曲家什么的了，要是我们路上听到什么好歌，我就尽量把它学来！

String.Source: It was beautiful. It will make for a fine gift.
String.Dest: 真漂亮啊，肯定能当成很棒的礼物！

String.Source: Then we'll just have to find another way. I can't tell my folks the truth. Not after Vikran left home. He was the eldest, and an adventurer like us.
String.Dest: 接下来我们只好找另外一条路了。我没法对我的人实话实说。尤其是在Vikran离开家之后。他是最老的一个，而且和我们一样，是个冒险家。

String.Source: What if it doesn't? This place is nice, but we can't stay here forever.
String.Dest: 要是它不能呢？这地方好是好，但我们不能老呆在这儿。

String.Source: I...I can't. Not after Vikran left home. He was the eldest, and an adventurer like us.
String.Dest: 我……我不能。不能在Vikran的后边离开家。他最年长, 跟我们一样是个冒险者.

String.Source: Or you could just drop the charade and admit you aren't a bard.
String.Dest: 要么你还是放下伪装承认自己不是诗人吧。

String.Source: Would you? Could you? Oh, but that would probably be a slap in Dibella's face, when she's provided so much material for me to use!
String.Dest: 你会吗你？你行吗你？哦，也许你会给迪贝拉脸上来一耳光，她真是给我提供了N多原料啊！

String.Source: Maybe it'd be faster if I wrote a song for you.
String.Dest: 如果是为了你写歌的话，我想我会很快完成的。

String.Source: No, we must soldier on! Keep our eyes open and have our quills at the ready!
String.Dest: 不,我们必须坚持住!我睁大眼睛，随时准备奋笔疾书！

String.Source: Maybe it'd be faster if I wrote a song for you.
String.Dest: 如果是为了你写歌的话，我想我会很快完成的。

String.Source: Even if you were right, that would make my parents more suspicious! They already came by the college once when I wasn't there.
String.Dest: 就算你是对的，那也只会加重我父母的疑心！我还没有三岁大的时候他们已经去过一次学院了。

String.Source: It's better this way. Most people want a gift they can trade in for gold.
String.Dest: 这样更好。大多数人喜欢可以用黄金买到的礼物。

String.Source: Luckily half the bards were commissioned for a party in Whiterun. Otherwise I'd be in Cidhna Mine for sure.
String.Dest: 幸好那些吟游诗人有半数都是白漫城一个行会的。不然我肯定要被送进希讷矿坑 了。

String.Source: It's better this way. Most people want a gift they can trade in for gold.
String.Dest: 这样更好。大多数人喜欢可以用黄金买到的礼物。

String.Source: Yes, it's a lot to take in. Maybe that's it! Tomorrow's tour of the grotto will be twice as long with hour long viewing sessions of the plant life!
String.Dest: 是的, 还有很多需要搬进来. 搞不好就是这样! 明天的洞穴导览将会比一个观察植物一生的观察课题还要长两倍!

String.Source: If all of this doesn't inspire you, then you're clearly hopeless.
String.Dest: 如果这些都无法让你重新振作，你就真的毁了。

String.Source: Will I? I'm beginning to worry. I'm not sure why it's taking this long. Maybe I drank too much milk this morning. I feel kind of woozy.
String.Dest: 我吗? 我开始有点担心了. 我不确定为什么要谈这么久. 可能我早上喝太多牛奶了. 我感到有点头晕.

String.Source: Don't worry, you'll think of something eventually.
String.Dest: 别担心，你肯定能想起什么的。

String.Source: Oh, I wasn't worried about that. I was more concerned the view would be marred by the animals.
String.Dest: 哦，我担心的不是那个。我更在乎的是这景观会被野生动物给毁坏了。

String.Source: Yes, I'd rather not get mauled by some beast because we were enjoying the view.
String.Dest: 是啊，我多麽希望不要被那些不解风情的野兽打扰，那时我们正享受着风景呢。

String.Source: How can you appreciate a beautiful view if half of it is obstructed by an angry bear?
String.Dest: 如果这儿一半的地方都被一只愤怒的熊霸占了，你又能如何欣赏美景呢？

String.Source: Yes, I'd rather not get mauled by some beast because we were enjoying the view.
String.Dest: 是啊，我多麽希望不要被那些不解风情的野兽打扰，那时我们正享受着风景呢。

String.Source: Then again, it'll be hard not to notice some of the wonders Dibella has laid out for us.
String.Dest: 再说，让迪贝拉不注意到我们奠定的奇迹是很难的一件事。

String.Source: Yes, I'd rather not get mauled by some beast because we were enjoying the view.
String.Dest: 是啊，我多麽希望不要被那些不解风情的野兽打扰，那时我们正享受着风景呢。

String.Source: Which does go hand in hand with the second rule of adventuring. Always study your surroundings.
String.Dest: 这与冒险守则第二条相一致。永远注意周遭环境。

String.Source: Yes, I'd rather not get mauled by some beast because we were enjoying the view.
String.Dest: 是啊，我多麽希望不要被那些不解风情的野兽打扰，那时我们正享受着风景呢。

String.Source: Alright, I've convinced myself. Let the tour commence!
String.Dest: 好吧, 我对自己有信心。让我们开始吧！

String.Source: Yes, I'd rather not get mauled by some beast because we were enjoying the view.
String.Dest: 是啊，我多麽希望不要被那些不解风情的野兽打扰，那时我们正享受着风景呢。

String.Source: It's tempting, but it probably wouldn't be entirely safe. Although on the other hand, I've never adventured with a partner before.
String.Dest: 真是诱人，它可能不会完全安全。但另一方面，我以前从来没有与合作伙伴冒过险。

String.Source: There's no harm in doing a little sightseeing on the way.
String.Dest: 在路上稍微欣赏一下风景也无妨。

String.Source: Maybe you can afford to stop and admire things, so long as the other person is on their guard.
String.Dest: 如果其他人对你保持警惕的话，也许你得停下来并称赞某物。

String.Source: There's no harm in doing a little sightseeing on the way.
String.Dest: 在路上稍微欣赏一下风景也无妨。

String.Source: Alright then, let the tour commence!
String.Dest: 好啦，旅程现在正式开始！

String.Source: There's no harm in doing a little sightseeing on the way.
String.Dest: 在路上稍微欣赏一下风景也无妨。

String.Source: Yes, it'll be just like adventuring, only at the end we'll write a song about it! Or a poem! Who knows! That's what makes it so exciting!
String.Dest: Yes, it'll be just like adventuring, only at the end we'll write a song about it! Or a poem! Who knows! That's what makes it so exciting!

String.Source: At least you'll be inspired by something you appreciate.
String.Dest: 至少你能从中受到一些启迪。

String.Source: The question is, where will we find inspiration? And I have the answer! Handsome Man's Grotto, formerly of the Bloated variety!
String.Dest: 问题是，我们将在哪里寻找灵感呢？有了！傲慢者石窟, 过去的骄傲者石窟！

String.Source: At least you'll be inspired by something you appreciate.
String.Dest: 至少你能从中受到一些启迪。

String.Source: No longer will people call it bloated, because we'll have drowned those people out with our shouting! So onward, friend, we march to Dibella's drum!
String.Dest: 不会再有人说它傲慢, 因为我们将会用吼声把他们淹没！ 向前！我的朋友，向着迪贝拉's drum冲!

String.Source: At least you'll be inspired by something you appreciate.
String.Dest: 至少你能从中受到一些启迪。

String.Source: They are? Well, I'm glad I didn't learn anything from those two. When you have a big extended family, you get enough in-fighting as it is.
String.Dest: 是吗？他们？好吧，我真庆幸没从他俩那里学习什么。当你有个大家族时，你就会对内斗感到厌倦。

String.Source: So what was the point of this duel? Do you realize they're still fighting?
String.Dest: 那么到底这场决斗的意义在哪里？你难道没意识到他们仍然还在打吗？

String.Source: The last thing I need is to make poems and songs about it. That's not positive at all!
String.Dest: 临睡前的我需要做的最后一件事是写关于它的诗歌。这不算什么！

String.Source: So what was the point of this duel? Do you realize they're still fighting?
String.Dest: 那么到底这场决斗的意义在哪里？你难道没意识到他们仍然还在打吗？

String.Source: It's the same kind of downward thinking that gave Bloated Man's Grotto its name. Some say it's really quite glorious! In fact, I'm certain of it!
String.Dest: It's the same kind of downward thinking that gave Bloated Man's Grotto its name. Some say it's really quite glorious! In fact, I'm certain of it!

String.Source: So what was the point of this duel? Do you realize they're still fighting?
String.Dest: 那么到底这场决斗的意义在哪里？你难道没意识到他们仍然还在打吗？

String.Source: I bet that's where we'll find my inspiration! Handsome Man's Grotto! Hire the carriage! Let go of the reins! To Falkreath citizens, beauty awaits!
String.Dest: 我打赌我们能在那找到灵感！傲慢者石窟！雇辆马车！放开缰绳！去福克瑞斯吧公民，美好的一切正等着我们呢！

String.Source: So what was the point of this duel? Do you realize they're still fighting?
String.Dest: 那么到底这场决斗的意义在哪里？你难道没意识到他们仍然还在打吗？

String.Source: That's the spirit! The place I'm thinking of is a cave west of Riverwood, the very same one I petitioned to the Jarl to have its named changed.
String.Dest: 就是这个感觉！这个地方我觉得是河木镇西边的一个洞穴，就和我向领主请求改名的那个很像。

String.Source: I'm ready Amalee. Just tell me where and I'll take you.
String.Dest: 我准备好了，艾米莉。告诉我去哪儿就成，我会带给你。

String.Source: In truth, I'd rather not step inside a place called Bloated Man's Grotto. But now I realize that on the map of the Gods, that name is a misprint!
String.Dest: In truth, I'd rather not step inside a place called Bloated Man's Grotto. But now I realize that on the map of the Gods, that name is a misprint!

String.Source: I'm ready Amalee. Just tell me where and I'll take you.
String.Dest: 我准备好了，艾米莉。告诉我去哪儿就成，我会带给你。

String.Source: To Handsome Man's Grotto! Leave no stone unturned! No landscape un-admired! To nature's beauty, I say, prepare to be stared at!
String.Dest: 去傲慢者石窟吧！我们得竭尽全力！那里的风景都美得让人窒息！为了自然之美，我得说，睁大眼睛好好看看吧！

String.Source: I'm ready Amalee. Just tell me where and I'll take you.
String.Dest: 我准备好了，艾米莉。告诉我去哪儿就成，我会带给你。

String.Source: Of course, I wouldn't actually jump. I might chip a nail, or worse!
String.Dest: 当然，实际上我并不会去跳，因为我也会把趾甲削片，或者更糟糕！

String.Source: By the Gods I hope you're speaking metaphorically.
String.Dest: 我的天，我希望你只是比喻一下。

String.Source: What I mean is, Skyrim is a big place. Inspiration is like an undiscovered wonder, just waiting for our eyes to discover it!
String.Dest: 我的意思是, 天际省地方很大. 灵感就像埋藏着的奇迹, 等着你的眼睛去发现!

String.Source: By the Gods I hope you're speaking metaphorically.
String.Dest: 我的天，我希望你只是比喻一下。

String.Source: In fact, I know just where to look! At first, I didn't consider it because I don't like the old name.
String.Dest: 事实上，我知道去哪里找！开头我没考虑它是因为我不喜欢原来的名字。

String.Source: By the Gods I hope you're speaking metaphorically.
String.Dest: 我的天，我希望你只是比喻一下。

String.Source: That's why I gave it a new one! To Handsome Man's Grotto, friend! There can be no other place!
String.Dest: 这就是为什么我单单给了傲慢者石窟一个新名字，朋友！我可没再给其他地方起名了！

String.Source: By the Gods I hope you're speaking metaphorically.
String.Dest: 我的天，我希望你只是比喻一下。

String.Source: Well, my lord does seem a tad...demanding. But all I really need is to find someone who can help me write my own music and poetry.
String.Dest: 额, 我家主人看上去有点...严格. 但我真的是要找人来帮我完成我的音乐和诗歌.

String.Source: If the Nord turns out to be the better bard, will you squire for him instead?
String.Dest: 如果诺德人才是最好的吟游诗人，那你会不会转而向他献殷勤？

String.Source: I have a lot of cousins, and it would help if I could figure this stuff out on my own.
String.Dest: 我的有很多的侄子，要是我能亲自弄清楚这东西就太好了。我的有很多的侄子，要是我能亲自弄清楚这东西就太好了。

String.Source: If the Nord turns out to be the better bard, will you squire for him instead?
String.Dest: 如果诺德人才是最好的吟游诗人，那你会不会转而向他献殷勤？

String.Source: For now, let's just bring these two friends together and hope for the best!
String.Dest: 现在嘛，带上他俩，但行好事，莫问前程。

String.Source: If the Nord turns out to be the better bard, will you squire for him instead?
String.Dest: 如果诺德人才是最好的吟游诗人，那你会不会转而向他献殷勤？

String.Source: Here's an idea, maybe you can squire for the Nord! Two companions, forced to take sides on opposite ends of a war! I feel inspired already!
String.Dest: 我有个主意，也许我们能够成为诺德地主！两个同伙，在战争的结果中各执一词！想想有些小激动呢！

String.Source: Yes, it will be good for you to see 2 masters in their prime dueling it out.
String.Dest: 是的，看到两位大师在最佳状态下一决高下，对你来说是件好事。

String.Source: But all in all, I think being an apprentice really is helpful.
String.Dest: 不过总得说来，我觉得做一个学徒真的特别有帮助。

String.Source: Yes, it will be good for you to see 2 masters in their prime dueling it out.
String.Dest: 是的，看到两位大师在最佳状态下一决高下，对你来说是件好事。

String.Source: My cousin Ignar once took a job under an Orc blacksmith because he needed the money, and he liked it so much he became one!
String.Dest: 我的表弟Ignar曾经在兽人铁匠手底下工作，因为他需要钱，而且他也想成为一名铁匠！

String.Source: Yes, it will be good for you to see 2 masters in their prime dueling it out.
String.Dest: 是的，看到两位大师在最佳状态下一决高下，对你来说是件好事。

String.Source: Of course, I would never stop being an adventurer. I also think Ignar was in love with that Orc.
String.Dest: 当然，我在成为冒险者的道路上永远不会止步。我甚至认为伊格奈喜欢兽人。

String.Source: Yes, it will be good for you to see 2 masters in their prime dueling it out.
String.Dest: 是的，看到两位大师在最佳状态下一决高下，对你来说是件好事。

String.Source: I don't see how any of this will help you be a better bard.
String.Dest: 我看不出这些会怎么帮助你成为一个更好的吟游诗人。

String.Source: It's not all that clear to me either, but I'm not a master bard like my lord is. But I think watching an artistic duel would be rather inspiring!
String.Dest: 尽管我还不觉明了，我不像师父那样是个游吟诗人大师。但我仍对看到一场巅峰对决振奋不已。

String.Source: I don't see how any of this will help you be a better bard.
String.Dest: 我看不出这些会怎么帮助你成为一个更好的吟游诗人。

String.Source: My uncle Asran once challenged my aunt to a drinking contest, and that's how I learned how to behave like an adult! So this could work too!
String.Dest: 我叔叔爱斯兰曾经在喝酒比赛上挑战我的婶婶，这让我学会了怎么表现的像个大人，也学会了这个活儿！

String.Source: We could split up. You take A to M. I'll take N to Z.
String.Dest: 我们可以平分一下。你从A杀到M，我来杀N到Z。

String.Source: What a great idea! Wait, do you mean first names or last names? What if they have middle ones? Maybe we really do need a clairvoyance tome.
String.Dest: 这主意太棒了！等等，你是指名字还是姓来着？万一他们在名与姓中间还有自取名那怎么办？看来我们真的需要一本洞察术法术书啊。

String.Source: We could split up. You take A to M. I'll take N to Z.
String.Dest: 我们可以平分一下。你从A杀到M，我来杀N到Z。

String.Source: My aunt Hilda was a soothsayer. Most of my cousins ask her where to go next. But what's the fun it that?
String.Dest: My aunt Hilda was a soothsayer. Most of my cousins ask her where to go next. But what's the fun it that?

String.Source: We could split up. You take A to M. I'll take N to Z.
String.Dest: 我们可以平分一下。你从A杀到M，我来杀N到Z。

String.Source: I say we just keep our eyes to the sky and our ears to the ground, and this Nord will show his face eventually!
String.Dest: 要我说咱就眼睛盯着天耳朵听着地，迟早那些诺德人会露面的！

String.Source: Well, that was a fun little tour wasn't it? I don't feel all that inspired yet, but I'm sure it will come when I least expect it. Maybe.
String.Dest: 哇，这趟旅行挺有趣不是吗？我还没感受到全部的灵感，但我肯定静下心来的话会有的。也许吧。

String.Source: Hmm...as much as I want to start exploring right away, it does seem like this place is a tad dangerous.
String.Dest: 唔……尽管我想立刻去周围看看，不过这里看起来有那么点危险。

String.Source: We shan't forget the first rule of adventuring. Clear the cave of mean animals and evildoers before we commence with the sightseeing!
String.Dest: 我们不该忘记冒险的第一准则。在开始看风景之前把乱七八糟的野兽啊王八蛋啊之类的东西先清理掉。

String.Source: What was I thinking! The inspiration for bards is the same as for adventurers! It's about nature, beauty, and the spirit of exploration!
String.Dest: 想什么呢我！对吟游诗人有效的启示对冒险者也一样！就是关于自然、美丽，和探索的精神啊！

String.Source: Look at this boundless ocean, just waiting for us to dive right in! I'm ready to jump, are you?
String.Dest: Look at this boundless ocean, just waiting for us to dive right in! I'm ready to jump, are you?

String.Source: Okay! We have some direction! Now to find this Nord he keeps talking about. Shouldn't be too hard. How many Nords could there be in Skyrim?
String.Dest: 好啊！我们终于有方向了！现在找到他一直提到的诺德人就好。这不会太难。在天际省有多少诺德人来着？

String.Source: Probably a lot. But don't lose heart, adventurer, we'll just have to talk to them all!
String.Dest: 大概有很多吧。但是冒险者，不要失去本心了，我们将要和他们所有人交谈。

String.Source: I was thinking about our talk last night, and I realized something.
String.Dest: 我在想我们昨晚的谈话，然后我意识到了某些东西。

String.Source: Well, what do you think?
String.Dest: 呃，你怎么看？

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: The rivers rush over Whiterun, as the sun rides in the sky, elks graze on the grassland, as a hawk passes by.
String.Dest: 河水流过雪满城，太阳高照，麋鹿悠闲的吃草，老鹰从空中飞过.

String.Source: The forest in the Rift, where the trees are spun of gold, and Handsome Man's Grotto, what wonders can it hold?
String.Dest: The forest in the Rift, where the trees are spun of gold, and Handsome Man's Grotto, what wonders can it hold?

String.Source: Skyrim's home to many beautiful things! A butterfly in sunbeams, with jewels on its wings.
String.Dest: 天际是很多美丽事物的故乡！她是日光下飞舞的蝴蝶，翅膀上还有璀璨的宝石加以点缀。

String.Source: The cresting of the waves 'neath the ships at sea, and in the Eldergleam there grows a twining Tree.
String.Dest: 波浪在船下涌起, 在Eldergleam 长着一颗环抱树.

String.Source: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.
String.Dest: The singing of the wolves, or the buzzing of a bee, a dragon tongue in blossom, or an eagle flying free.

String.Source: Let nature now surround you, let it fill up your heart! We're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: 让大自然包围你，让它充斥着你的心！我们的肉体是迪贝拉创造的，我们是她的艺术品。

String.Source: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.
String.Dest: Yes, we're the clay that She shapes, we are all Dibella's art.

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: As an adventurer, I always understood why my brother left, and as a daughter, why my parents would be angry.
String.Dest: 作为一名冒险者，我一直都懂我哥哥为什么会离开，而作为一名女儿，我也知道我的父母因何而生气。

String.Source: I guess that's why I've tried my best to share Dibella's beauty with everyone. It's just with Ma and Pa, I didn't know how.
String.Dest: 我猜那就是为什么我尽我所能将迪贝拉的美分享给所有人。我不懂为什么她的美只有为人父母者知道。

String.Source: But if I can make music that's inspired by my travels, by scenes like this...then maybe that'll be enough.
String.Dest: 如果我能通过我的旅行，通过这样的场景寻觅到创作音乐的灵感...那么这就够了。

String.Source: Because in the end, it's not just about appreciating beauty. It's about having someone to share it with.
String.Dest: 因为到最后，问题将不只是欣赏美人，而是关于和大家一起分享。

String.Source: So with that in mind, I spent all night composing this song.
String.Dest: 因此，考虑到这一点， 我花了一整夜的时间创作了这首歌。

String.Source: I was too young too remember. Ma and Pa never really talk about it, but my sister Elise told me it was because I remind them of him.
String.Dest: 那时候我太小没记住.爸爸妈妈也没再提这个,但我姐姐埃莉斯告诉我这是因为我让他们想起了他

String.Source: Vikran loved to climb. He was always trying to get to the top of the mountain so he could get the best view.
String.Dest: Vikran喜欢爬山。他总是尽可能的爬到山顶，这样他就能看到最美的风景了。

String.Source: Elise said he wasn't afraid of anything. He was positive, cheerful, and full of life. He was born to be an explorer.
String.Dest: Elise说他不害怕任何东西。他总是那么积极，那么快乐的过着充实的生活。他是个天生的探险家。

String.Source: But Ma and Pa wanted him to stay home and help take care of the family. So one day he just up and left.
String.Dest: 但是爸爸妈妈想要他留在家里，给家里帮忙。因此有一天他就这么走了。

String.Source: Ever since then, Pa would wake up in the middle of the night and stoke the fire, just in case he came home.
String.Dest: 从那时起，爹就每天半夜爬起来给炉子添柴，只为了等他回来。

String.Source: And if I told them the truth...well, it just wouldn't be very nice to make them worry any more than they already do.
String.Dest: 如果我告诉他们真相的话……呃，他们会对自己已然做过的事更加糟心，这可不好。

String.Source: But thanks for the talk. We better get some sleep. We have a long day ahead of us, and we'll need all our energy.
String.Dest: 谢谢你的谈话。我们最好去睡会儿觉。还有一整天摆在我们面前呢，而我们都需要补充精力。

String.Source: Anyways, I'm a little exhausted. Let's head back to camp and start fresh and early tomorrow!
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我有点累。让我们回到营地，等待开始新的一天吧！

String.Source: Anyways, I'm a little exhausted. Let's head back to camp and start fresh and early tomorrow!
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我有点累。让我们回到营地，等待开始新的一天吧！

String.Source: I know animals like to hunt each other, but this really isn't the time or place to be doing it.
String.Dest: I know animals like to hunt each other, but this really isn't the time or place to be doing it.

String.Source: That's what dens and dining tables are for. They should know better.
String.Dest: 那就是兽穴和饭桌的作用，他们应该知道得更清楚。

String.Source: When will mortals learn that monuments like this only defile nature? Also, Talos could do with a clean shave.
String.Dest: When will mortals learn that monuments like this only defile nature? Also, Talos could do with a clean shave.

String.Source: Why is everyone lying down? They should be admiring this place!
String.Dest: 为什么每个人都躺尸了？他们应该好好欣赏这个地方的！

String.Source: Look at this place! So much to see! So much to take in!
String.Dest: 看看这地方！这么多可看的！这么多可拿的！

String.Source: The ocean, the sky, it's beautiful. By Dibella, this is true art! This is what really inspires!
String.Dest: 那海，那天，真漂亮，美丽之神迪贝拉的作品，这才是真正的艺术！这才是真正让人精神振奋的东西！

String.Source: Hey guys! Have you noticed the view from here! It's spectacular!
String.Dest: 嘿，伙计们！注意这里的风景了吗！太壮观了！

String.Source: I don't think you're a monster, although you are a tad arrogant. But farewell!
String.Dest: 我不认为你是个怪物，虽然你有点儿傲慢。祝你一路平安！

String.Source: Um...yes, that's right. No makeup at all. That's me...all natural.
String.Dest: Um...yes, that's right. No makeup at all. That's me...all natural.

String.Source: And if tomorrow morning you see someone plucking their eyebrows near the river, then go back to sleep, it's probably someone else!
String.Dest: 还有如果明天早晨你看到有人在河边拔眉毛，那就回去睡觉吧，那可能是别的什么人！

String.Source: Really? What do you mean by effortless?
String.Dest: 真的么？你所谓的“不费力”是什么意思？

String.Source: But we already know each other. And we have plenty of time to talk on the road. What else could you possibly...ohhhhhhhh.
String.Dest: 不过我们已经互相了解了，以及我们还有大把的时间能在路上聊一聊。你还能...哦哦哦哦哦哦哦。

String.Source: But, um, I'm sure you already know countless beauties. There's no need for, um...further knowledge.
String.Dest: 但是，恩，我想你已经阅女无数。不需要，呃，进一步的知识了。

String.Source: Right away my lord! Get out the clairvoyance tomes! Put on your courier boots! We have a person to find!
String.Dest: 马上我的王!拿出千里眼法术! 穿上疾风靴! 我们要找一个人!

String.Source: Certainly! But how will shining my lord's boots help me make art? Are you sure you don't want to introduce me to your friend?
String.Dest: 当然！但是帮我的主人擦亮靴子如何对我的艺术有所裨益？你确定你不会把我介绍给你的朋友吗？

String.Source: Um...okay! My name's Amalee! Just tell me where to grab on!
String.Dest: 嗯……好吧！我叫艾米莉!你就告诉我哪儿能抓吧!

String.Source: That's...nice, but I don't think I'm the right audience for that. Can you introduce me to your Nord friend? He sounds like he'd be a lot of help.
String.Dest: 那。。很不错, 但我认为自己欣赏不来那个. 你能把我引荐给你的诺德朋友么？ 他听起来像有大用处的样子.

String.Source: Thank you, I think. Are you a student here at the college?
String.Dest: 我得说，谢谢你。你是这个学院里的学生吗？

String.Source: Is this the library? There aren't many books. Is that a health potion on the bookcase? I'm confused.
String.Dest: 这是图书馆吗？也没多少书啊。那是一个书架上是放着生命药水吗？我糊涂了 。

String.Source: Okay, I'm thinking a poem would be the best gift, because if you just make it confusing enough people will be too scared to judge it.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想一首诗是最好的礼物，因为如果你用它糊弄过足够多的人就会难以辨别它的水准。

String.Source: Skjarn, I'm so happy you agreed to this duel! It will really help me see what being a bard is all about! Dibella shine on you both!
String.Dest: 史卡盎，很高兴你能够接受这次决斗邀请！快让我亲眼见见一个真正的吟游诗人究竟是怎样的！愿迪贝拉庇佑你们！

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: You know I'm fond of nature, and it's really important to me. But my first love will always be crack cocaine.
String.Dest: 你知道我喜欢大自然，而且它真的对我很重要。但是我最爱的永远是可卡因。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Of course! Where do we go first? North? South? Left? Down? It doesn't matter! Wherever we go, beauty and adventure awaits!
String.Dest: 当然！我们从哪里开始？北边？南边？左边？下边？无所谓！不管去到哪里，都有美女和冒险等着我们！

String.Source: All right.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Onward, love!
String.Dest: 前进吧，亲爱的！

String.Source: Let's go! Shouting is always better in pairs!
String.Dest: 一起走吧! 一个巴掌拍不响!

String.Source: Dibella guide us.
String.Dest: 迪贝拉指引我们。

String.Source: Divines bless us with their beauty.
String.Dest: 圣灵用他们的美好保佑我们。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Greetings. Have you spread word of Dibella's beauty?
String.Dest: 你好啊。你有传播迪贝拉之美了吗？

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: I'm ready when you are, love.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我时刻愿意为你效劳。

String.Source: What's our next move, dear? Is it toward each other? That's fine with me!
String.Dest: 下一步怎么走，亲爱的？朝向对方？我没意见！

String.Source: Where are we headed next? I always say, when in doubt, follow the nirnroot. Because the loudest root is the best route.
String.Dest: 接下来我们去哪儿？我总是说，如果拿不准，那就跟着奈恩根走吧。因为最吵闹的根是最好的路线。

String.Source: Adventure is waiting just around the corner. Which corner? All of them!
String.Dest: 冒险就是去某个角落干等着。哪个角落？任何角落！

String.Source: Onward we march, for Dibella's glory!
String.Dest: 我们坚定不移的向前进，为了迪贝拉的荣光！

String.Source: Hail, Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 向你致敬，龙裔!

String.Source: Something you need, Companion?
String.Dest: 有什么需要的吗，伙伴？

String.Source: Hey, be careful!
String.Dest: 嘿，小心点！

String.Source: I'm on your side!
String.Dest: 我就在你身旁！

String.Source: Stop it!
String.Dest: 别这样！
